Dimension Door (At Will).name: Porta Dimensionale (A Volontà)
Dimension Door (At Will).description:
Aprendo una porta che oltrepassa lo spazio normale, ti teletrasporti istantaneamente insieme a qualsiasi oggetto che indossi e trasporti dalla tua posizione attuale in uno spazio vuoto che puoi vedere entro il raggio d'azione. Se con questo incantesimo porti con te un'altra creatura (anche se la stai trasportando in un contenitore extradimensionale), l'incantesimo è perduto.

Intensificato (5°) Il raggio d'azione aumenta fino a 1,8 km. Non è necessario che tu sia in grado di vedere la tua destinazione, a patto che tu sia già stato in quel luogo in passato e che tu ne conosca relativamente la locazione e la distanza dalla tua posizione. Sei temporaneamente immune per 1 ora.

Freedom of Movement (Constant).name: Libertà di Movimento (Costante)
Freedom of Movement (Constant).description: Respingi gli effetti che ostacolerebbero una creatura o ne rallenterebbero i movimenti. Il bersaglio, mentre è sotto l'effetto di questo incantesimo, ignora tutti gli effetti che potrebbero fornire penalità di circostanza alla Velocità. Quando il bersaglio tenta di @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Sfuggire} da un effetto che lo ha @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Afferrato} o @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Trattenuto}, il tentativo ha successo automaticamente, a meno che l'effetto sia un effetto magico e di un livello superiore a quello dell'incantesimo libertà di movimento.

Detect Alignment (At Will) (Lawful Only).description:
I tuoi occhi risplendono nel percepire aure allineate. Scegli tra caotico, malvagio, buono o legale. Individui le aure di quell'allineamento. Non ricevi altre informazioni oltre alla presenza o all'assenza. Puoi scegliere di non individuare creature o effetti dei quali sei consapevole che abbiano quell'allineamento.

Soltanto gli incantatori di 6° livello o superiore, eccetto gli incantatori divini, i non morti e gli esseri della Sfera Esterna, hanno un'aura di allineamento.

Intensificato (2°) Individui anche la locazione e la forza di ciascuna aura.
Detect Alignment (At Will) (Lawful Only).name: Individuazione dell'Allineamento (A Volontà) (Solo Legale)

Change Shape.name: Cambiare Forma
Change Shape.description:
The izfiitar takes the appearance of any Huge or smaller creature. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Protean Anatomy 25.description:
A izfiitar's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after the izfiitar takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

The izfiitar is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, the izfiitar automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.
Protean Anatomy 25.name: Protean Anatomy 25

Reshape Reality.description: When the izfiitar casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Hallucinatory Terrain}, it infuses the illusion with quasi-real substance. Creatures that do not disbelieve the illusion treat structures and terrain created through the spell as though they were real, ascending illusory stairs, becoming trapped by illusory quicksand, and so on.
Reshape Reality.name: Reshape Reality

Greater Warpwave Strike.name: Greater Warpwave Strike
Greater Warpwave Strike.description:
Any creature struck and damaged by an izfiitar's jaws or claw Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42] save or be subject to a particularly powerful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

Roll twice and apply both affects, rerolling any duplicates.

Storm of Claws.name: Storm of Claws
Storm of Claws.description: The izfiitar makes up to six claw Strikes, each against a different target.

Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 120 feet.description:
A Izfiitar can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants the izflitar the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The izflitar's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.
Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 120 feet.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 120 feet

Prescient Revision.description:
Trigger The izfiitar fails a check

Effect The izfiitar rerolls the triggering check and takes the better result.

For [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, it loses the effects of Kiss of the Speakers and can't use Reshape Reality.
Prescient Revision.name: Prescient Revision

Kiss of the Speakers.name: Kiss of the Speakers
Kiss of the Speakers.description:
The izfiitar continuously tinkers with the myriad possibilities in which it can move or manipulate magic.

The izfiitar is always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the extra action only to Cast a Spell, Step, or Stride.

Izfiitar.name: Izfiitar
Izfiitar.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Project Image (At Will) (See Project Fal.description:
Proietti un'immagine illusoria su te stesso. Devi rimanere entro il raggio d'azione dell'immagine, e se in un qualasiasi momento non riesci a vedere l'immagine, l'incantesimo termina. Quando Lanci un Incantesimo che non sia un incantesimo con area emanazione, puoi far originare l'effetto dell'incantesimo da te stesso o dall'immagine. Dato che l'immagine è un'illusione, non può realmente benificiare di incantesimi, sebbene appaia in qualsiasi manifestazione visiva dell'incantesimo. L'immagine ha la stessa tua CA e gli stessi tuoi tiri salvezza. Se viene colpita da un attacco o fallisce un tiro salvezza, l'incantesimo svanisce.

Intensificato (+2) La durata massima in cui puoi Mantenere l'Incantesimo aumenta di 10 minuti.
Project Image (At Will) (See Project Fal.name: Project Image (At Will) (See Project False Image)

Tongues (Constant).name: Linguaggi (Costante)
Tongues (Constant).description:
Il bersaglio può capire il significato delle parole di tutte le lingue e parlare le lingue di altre creature. In un gruppo misto di creature, ogni volta che il bersaglio parla può scegliere una creatura e parlarci in una lingua che la creatura capisce, anche se non sa di quale lingua si tratti.

Intensificato (7°) La durata è 8 ore.

Fast Swallow.name: Inghiottire Rapido
Fast Swallow.description:
Trigger The camarach Grabs a creature

Effect The camarach uses Swallow Whole.

Project False Image.description: When the camarach casts project image, its illusory image can be another creature of its size or a structure of its size that features a large portal (such as a freestanding archway or a large hut with an open doorway).
Project False Image.name: Project False Image

Disgorge Portal.description:
The camarach vomits a spray of coruscating light. This has the effect of a DC 42 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{Prismatic Spray}, except that each creature is affected by one violet beam and one other beam (roll 1d6 instead of 1d8 to determine which other beam).

The camarach can't Disgorge a Portal again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.
Disgorge Portal.name: Disgorge Portal

Exile.description:
The camarach shunts one creature within its body through an inner portal to send it away.

The target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:38] save.

Critical Success The creature is teleported to an open space it chooses within 30 feet of the camarach.

Success The creature isn't teleported.

Failure The creature is teleported to a random open space 1 mile from the camarach.

Critical Failure The creature is teleported to a random other plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift}.
Exile.name: Exile

Motion Sense 60 feet.name: Percezione del Movimento 18 metri
Motion Sense 60 feet.description: Tyrroicese can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

Stretching Step.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Tyrroicese forcefully extends a sticky pseudopod, plants it on a wall within 45 feet, and retracts the muscle.

Tyrroicese springs over to a space adjacent to the wall, moving through the intervening squares as normal but ignoring any difficult or greater difficult terrain.
Stretching Step.name: Stretching Step

Pseudopod Burst.description:
Tyrroicese makes up to three pseudopod strikes, each against a different creature.

Tyrroicese's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all these attacks are made.
Pseudopod Burst.name: Pseudopod Burst

Subsume.description:
Tyrroicese lifts an adjacent dying creature with its pseudopods and subsumes that creature into its own oozy flesh. The subsumed creature's dying value does not increase, though it can't decrease either.

Tyrroicese regains 30 HP and also gains the ability to use one or two of the subsumed creature's special abilities or feats, subject to the GM's discretion.

A creature adjacent to Tyrroicese can extract a subsumed creature by spending 2 actions to attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:29|name:Extract Subsumed Creature] check.

On a success, the subsumed creature is pulled from Tyrroicese and falls into the nearest available space.
Subsume.name: Subsume

Rallying Call.name: Rallying Call
Rallying Call.description:
When Tyrroicese subsumed Corporal Quordein, it gained a perverted form of the commander's ability to rally allies.

The first time Tyrroicese uses this ability, it summons an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.uQBOJfjtzEXvpLQz]{Ochre Jelly}, which leaks out of the ceiling of area D13 and drops to the floor to join the fight, siding with Tyrroicese.

Thereafter, when Tyrroicese uses this ability, any oozes within 60 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round (the oozes can use their extra action only to Stride) and, if they're not allied with the agents, the oozes ally themselves with Tyrroicese.

Tyrroicese.name: Tyrroicese
Tyrroicese.npcSenses: percezione del movimento 18 metri, privo di vista

Alchemical Reaction.description:
Trigger The alchemical horror takes damage from an alchemical bomb

Effect The volatile substances that compose the alchemical horror froth outward as they react with the bomb. The bomb's full effects affect creatures in every space within 15 feet of the alchemical horror, and splash damage affects creatures 5 feet beyond that.
Alchemical Reaction.name: Alchemical Reaction

Alchemical Torrent.name: Alchemical Torrent
Alchemical Torrent.description:
The alchemical horror spews a torrent of alchemical fluids in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] that deals [[/r 20d6[acid]]] damage to creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true] save).

The alchemical horror can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Air Walk (Constant).description: Il bersaglio può camminare nell'aria come se camminasse su terreno solido. Può salire e scendere in questo modo con un'angolazione massima di 45 gradi.
Air Walk (Constant).name: Air Walk (Constant)

Dispel Magic (At Will).name: Dissolvi Magie (A Volontà)
Dispel Magic (At Will).description: Disperdi la magia che si cela dietro un incantesimo o effetto. Effettua una prova di contrasto contro il bersaglio. Se il tentativo ha successo contro un effetto di incantesimo, lo contrasti. Se ha successo contro un oggetto magico, quell'oggetto diventa un oggetto comune del suo tipo per 10 minuti. Le proprietà non magiche dell'oggetto non cambiano. Se il bersaglio è un artefatto o un oggetto simile, fallisci automaticamente.

Mask of Terror (Constant) (See Tainted B.description:
Il bersaglio appare come una creatura orribile e spaventosa. L'effetto è unico per ciascun osservatore, perciò un umano che osserva il bersaglio potrebbe vedere un demone con le zanne insanguinate, mentre un demone che lo osserva potrebbe vedere un viso angelico splendente. Quando una qualsiasi creatura effettua un’azione ostile contro il bersaglio, la creatura deve effettuare un tiro salvezza su Volontà. Dopodiché è temporaneamente immune fino alla fine del suo turno successivo.

SuccessoLa creatura non è influenzata.

Fallimento La creatura è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Spaventata 2} prima di aver effettuato la sua azione.

Fallimento Critico La creatura è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Spaventata 2} e la sua azione fallisce ed è sprecata.

Intensificato (8°) Puoi prendere come bersaglio fino a 5 creature. Se una creatura effettua un'azione ostile che ha effetto su più bersagli simultaneamente, necessita di un solo tiro salvezza contro maschera di terrore.
Mask of Terror (Constant) (See Tainted B.name: Mask of Terror (Constant) (See Tainted Backlash)

Fear (At Will).description:
Infondi paura nel bersaglio; questi deve effettuare un tiro salvezza su Volontà.

Successo Critico Il bersaglio non è influenzato.

Successo Il bersaglio è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1.

Fallimento Il bersaglio è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 2.

Fallimento Critico Il bersaglio è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Spaventato} 3 e @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{In Fuga} per 1 round.
Fear (At Will).name: Paura (A Volontà)

Nightmare (At Will).description:
Mandi degli incubi inquietanti al bersaglio. La prossima volta che il bersaglio si addormenta, deve effettuare un tiro salvezza su Volontà. Se conosci il bersaglio soltanto per nome e non lo hai mai incontrato, il bersaglio ottiene un bonus di circostanza +4 al tiro salvezza su Volontà.

Successo Critico Il bersaglio non subisce effetti avversi all'incubo ed è temporaneamente immune per 1 settimana.

Successo Il bersaglio ha gli incubi, ma non subisce effetti avversi oltre a ricordi inquietanti.

Fallimento Il bersaglio ha gli incubi e si sveglia @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Affaticato}.

Fallimento Critico Il bersaglio ha gli incubi, si sveglia @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Affaticato} ed è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Risucchiato} 2 finchè rimane @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Affaticato}.
Nightmare (At Will).name: Nightmare (At Will)

Detect Magic (Constant).description:
Emetti un impulso che registra la presenza di magia. Non ricevi altre informazioni oltre alla presenza o all assenza di magia. Puoi scegliere di ignorare una magia della quale sei pienamente consapevole, come gli oggetti magici e i tuoi incantesimi in corso o dei tuoi alleatis.

Individui la magia di illusione soltanto se l'effetto di quella magia ha un livello inferiore al livello del tuo incantesimo individuazione del magico. Tuttavia, gli oggetti che hanno un'aura di illusione, ma non sono ingannevoli all'apparenza (come una pozione di invisibilità) di solito vengono individuati normalmente.

Intensificato (3°) Apprendi la scuola di magia dell'effetto magico di livello più alto individuato dall'incantesimo entro il raggio d'azione. Se più effetti hanno lo stesso livello, il GM determina quale apprendi.

Intensificato (4°) Come per il 3° livello, ma individui anche la fonte della magia di livello più alto. Come per sensi imprecisi, non apprendi la locazione esatta, ma puoi restringere la fonte a un cubo con spigolo di 1,5 metri (o il più vicino a te se ha dimensioni maggiori).
Detect Magic (Constant).name: Detect Magic (Constant)

Distort Magic.description:
Trigger A creature targets the nenchuuj with a spell

Effect The nenchuuj warps the creature's magic, attempting an Arcana check to counteract the spell. If successful, the nenchuuj can instead redirect the spell, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OOELvfkTedBMlWtq]{Spell Turning}, onto the caster or onto a different target within range from the caster.
Distort Magic.name: Distort Magic

Easy to Call.name: Easy to Call
Easy to Call.description: The sahkil is considered 2 levels lower for the purposes of being summoned by rituals (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Planar Binding}), but is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success.

Skip Between.name: Skip Between
Skip Between.description: The sahkil can move itself between the Ethereal Plane and the Material Plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt}, except that this ability has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed.

Tainted Backlash.name: Tainted Backlash
Tainted Backlash.description:
A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} by the sahkil's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror} is gripped with fear of the ways magic can go wrong.

The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for as long as it is frightened. If the creature Casts a Spell during its turn, it can't reduce its frightened condition at the end of that turn.

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: Status +2 a tutti i TS contro Magia

Nenchuuj.name: Nenchuuj
Nenchuuj.npcAllSaves: status +2 a tutti i TS contro la magia

Consume Poison.description:
The poison eater uses an Interact action to draw a dose of poison and eats it, gaining strength.

The poison-eater's Strikes deal two weapon dice of damage rather than one. The poison eater is affected by the consumed poison normally and, therefore, usually chooses poisons mitigated by their poison resistance and toxin-inured ability.

At the end of each of their turns, the poison eater attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:17|name:Consumed Poison Metabolizes] check; on a success, this ability ends.
Consume Poison.name: Consume Poison

Poison Frenzy.description:
Requirements The poison eater isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or already in a frenzy

Trigger the poison eater damages a creature while Consume Poison is in effect

Effect The poison eater flies into a frenzy that lasts for 1 minute. While in a frenzy, the poison eater gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with melee Strikes, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with melee Strikes, gains 20 temporary Hit Points until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. The poison eater can't voluntarily end their frenzy. After their frenzy, the poison eater is fatigued.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.u2z1BgpZsxl7Zc2z]{Effect: Poison Frenzy}
Poison Frenzy.name: Poison Frenzy

Toxin-Inured.description: A poison eater can't gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition from poisons.
Toxin-Inured.name: Toxin-Inured

Illusory Creature (At Will).description:
Crei un'immagine illusoria di una creatura di taglia Grande o inferiore. L'immagine genera i suoni e gli odori appropriati e sembra vera al tocco. Se tu e la tua immagine vi allontanate a una distanza superiore a 150 metri, l'incantesimo termina.

L'immagine non può parlare, ma puoi usare le tue azioni per parlare attraverso la creatura, con l'incantesimo che camuffa la tua voce in modo appropriato. Potresti dover effettuare una prova di Esibizione o Inganno per comportarti come la creatura in modo convincente, come determinato dal GM. Questo è indicato specialmente se stai tentando di imitare una persona specifica e devi avere a che fare con qualcuno che conosce quella persona.

In combattimento, l'illusione può usare 2 azioni per turno, che effettua mentre Mantieni l'Incantesimo. L'illusione usa i tuoi Tiri per Colpire con incantesimo per i Tiri per Colpire, e la tua CD di incantesimo per la sua CA. I suoi modificatori per i Tiri Salvezza sono pari alla tua CD di incantesimo - 10. L'illusione ha una consistenza sufficiente da poter Attaccare ai Fianchi altre creature. Se l'immagine viene colpita da un attacco o fallisce un Tiro Salvezza, l'incantesimo termina.

L'illusione può infliggere danno facendo credere al bersaglio che i suoi attacchi sono reali, ma non può comunque avere effetto direttamente sul mondo fisico. Se la creatura illusoria va a segno con un Colpo, il bersaglio subisce un ammontare di danni mentali pari a 1d4 più il tuo modificatore di caratteristica dell'incantatore. Questo è un effetto mentale. I Colpi dell'illusione sono non letali. Se il danno non corrisponde all'immagine del mostro (per esempio, un drago illusorio di taglia Grande infligge soltanto 5 danni) il GM potrebbe permettere al bersaglio di effettuare una prova di Percezione immediata per dubitare dell'incantesimo. Tuttavia, qualsiasi resistenza o debolezza rilevanti vengono applicate se il bersaglio lo crede, come stabilito dal GM. Per esempio, se l'illusione impugna un martello da guerra ed attacca una creatura resistente ai danni contundenti, la creatura subirebbe un ammontare inferiore di danni mentali. Tuttavia, i danni illusori non impediscono la rigenerazione né innescano altri effetti che richiedono un certo tipo di danno. Il GM deve tracciare i danni illusori inflitti dall'illusione.

Qualsiasi creatura che tocca l'immagine o usa l'azione di Individuare per esaminarla può tentare di dubitare della tua illusione. Quando una creatura dubita dell'illusione, recupera metà dei danni che aveva subito da essa (se ce ne sono stati) e non subisce ulteriori danni dalla stessa.

Intensificato (+1) I danni inflitti dai Colpi dell'immagine aumentano di 1d4 e la taglia massima della creatura che puoi creare aumenta di 1 (fino a un massimo di Mastodontica).
Illusory Creature (At Will).name: Creatura Illusoria (A Volontà)

+2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor.description: Quest'armatura di cuoio è rinforzata con borchie di metallo e talvolta con piccole placche metalliche, offrendo molta della flessibilità di un'armatura di cuoio con una protezione più solida.
+2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor

Rejuvenation.name: Rinascita
Rejuvenation.description: When Miogimo is destroyed, he re-forms, fully healed, near a follower of his choice in [[/br 1d10 #Rejuvenation]]{1d10 days}. For the purposes of rejuvenation, a follower is defined as an intelligent creature who's well acquainted with Miogimo and is a true believer in Miogimo's mission, not merely a lukewarm supporter. Miogimo can be permanently destroyed only if he has no current followers or can be convinced to end his own life.

Trickster's Ace.name: Asso nella Manica
Trickster's Ace.description:
Trigger An effect would cause Miogimo to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} or would slow his movement

Effect Miogimo casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement} on himself.

Zealous Restoration.description: Miogimo can't regain Hit Points through resting or negative healing; he feeds only on the idealism of his supporters, regaining 10 Hit Points per day for each creature under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Q690d3mw3TUrKX7E]{Geas} cast by Miogimo. Creatures under Miogimo's geas have their maximum HP reduced by 10 each day until they are burned away to a husk and perish. After 24 hours, such creatures rise as zeal-damned ghouls under Miogimo's control. Zeal-damned ghouls eat only the flesh of evil or chaotic creatures and deal an additional 1d6 chaotic and 1d6 negative damage with their attacks.
Zealous Restoration.name: Zealous Restoration

Little Favors.description: Each time a creature willingly performs a service, quest, or task for the zealborn, the creature takes a cumulative -1 status penalty to saving throws against the zealborn's mental spells and abilities (maximum -4).
Little Favors.name: Little Favors

+1 Status to Will Saves vs. Mental.name: +1 Status to Will Saves vs. Mental

Miogimo.name: Miogimo
Miogimo.npcAllSaves: +1 status bonus to Will saves vs. mental effects

Hands Of The Forgotten.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Hands Of The Forgotten.hazardDisable: @Check[type:religion|dc:30|name:Exorcise Spirits] (master) to exorcise the spirits or @Check[type:intimidation|dc:32|name:Scare Away the Hands|traits:action:demoralize] (expert) to scare away the hands
Hands Of The Forgotten.description: Ethereal hands stretch out from the walls and floor, attempting to restrain nearby creatures.

+1 Striking Shovel.description: Derivata da un attrezzo agricolo usato per mietere granaglie e cereali a stelo lungo, quest'arma ha una lunga asta di legno con impugnature sporgenti, sovrastata da una lama curva posizionata ad angolo retto rispetto al manico.
+1 Striking Shovel.name: +1 Striking Shovel

Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).name: Borsa dell'Impedimento (Moderata)
Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).description:
Una borsa dell’impedimento è riempita con sostanze appiccicose. Quando colpisci una creatura con questo oggetto, la creatura subisce penalità di status a Velocità per 1 minuto. Molte varianti di borsa dell’impedimento concedono bonus di oggetto ai tiri per colpire.

In caso di colpo critico, una creatura a contatto con una superficie solida si attacca a quella superficie ed è immobilizzata per 1 round; una creatura che vola tramite ali, ha le ali aggrovigliate, questo la fa scendere a terra senza correre rischi e diventando incapace di Volare per 1 round. Le borse dell’impedimento sono inefficaci se usate contro una creatura che si trova in acqua.

Il bersaglio può far terminare qualsiasi effetto Sfuggendo o spendendo un totale di 3 azioni Interagire per rimuovere con molta attenzione le sostanze collose. Queste azioni Interagire non devono essere consecutive e anche altre creature possono eseguirle.

Ottieni bonus di oggetto +1 ai tiri per colpire. Il bersaglio subisce penalità di 4,5 metri e la CD per Sfuggire è 19.

+1 Chain Mail.description: Una cotta di maglia consiste di numerosi pezzi di armatura formati da piccoli anelli di metallo uniti in una maglia protettiva. Essa di solito comprende un giaco di maglia, gambali, un paio di bracciali e una cuffia, che insieme proteggono la maggior parte del corpo.
+1 Chain Mail.name: +1 Chain Mail

Ring of Lies.name: Anello delle Menzogne
Ring of Lies.description:
This plain silver ring has an almost oily sheen. While wearing the ring, you gain a +2 item bonus to Deception checks.

Activate D Interact

Effect Snapping your fingers on the hand that wears the ring causes the ring to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.JyxTmqjYYn63V5LY]{Glibness} on you with no visual manifestations of a spell being cast.

Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater).name: Mutageno del Colosso (Superiore)
Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant.

Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saves and 30 temporary Hit Points. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead.

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks and initiative rolls.

Duration 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.xLilBqqf34ZJYO9i]{Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)}

Concussive Beatdown.description:
Requirements Berleth has just used his shovel to Trip a creature

Effect Berleth brutally brings his shovel down on the prone foe, making a shovel Strike. On a hit, the Strike deals damage as normal, plus the target must make a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute.
Concussive Beatdown.name: Concussive Beatdown

Decapitate.name: Decapitate
Decapitate.description:
Berleth plunges his shovel through a creature's neck as though it were peat moss.

He makes a shovel Strike against an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} creature. On a hit, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 2} (possibly @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}).

Final Blow.name: Final Blow
Final Blow.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Berleth is reduced to 0 HP

Effect Berleth makes a final shovel Strike before dying.

Joro Spider Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} (1 round)

Stage 4 [[/r 2d8[poison]]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} ([[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds})
Joro Spider Venom.name: Joro Spider Venom

Web Trap.name: Web Trap
Web Trap.description: A creature hit by the joro spider's web Strike is immobilized and stuck to the nearest surface until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 25).

Flying Guillotine.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Flying Guillotine.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Erase Glyph|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to erase the glyph (which requires a successful unarmed attack roll if the blade is already active) or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (3rd level; counteract DC 20) to counteract it. The trap has a secret bypass known only to Ralso and Pratchett: as long as the guillotine can see a creature in the room touching thumb and pinky together with an empty hand, it remains dormant.
Flying Guillotine.hazardReset: After 1 minute, the trap deactivates, though the door remains locked. The trap rearms itself each day at dawn.
Flying Guillotine.hazardRoutine: (1 action) The blade @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Flies} up to 20 feet and Strikes any creatures whose squares it passes through. It cannot target the same creature more than once per round. The blade cannot be grappled and doesn't take a multiple attack penalty.
Flying Guillotine.description: An invisible magical glyph on the guillotine's blade detects living creatures in the room, which causes the guillotine to fly off its hinges and attack.

Project Image (at will).description:
Proietti un'immagine illusoria su te stesso. Devi rimanere entro il raggio d'azione dell'immagine, e se in un qualasiasi momento non riesci a vedere l'immagine, l'incantesimo termina. Quando Lanci un Incantesimo che non sia un incantesimo con area emanazione, puoi far originare l'effetto dell'incantesimo da te stesso o dall'immagine. Dato che l'immagine è un'illusione, non può realmente benificiare di incantesimi, sebbene appaia in qualsiasi manifestazione visiva dell'incantesimo. L'immagine ha la stessa tua CA e gli stessi tuoi tiri salvezza. Se viene colpita da un attacco o fallisce un tiro salvezza, l'incantesimo svanisce.

Intensificato (+2) La durata massima in cui puoi Mantenere l'Incantesimo aumenta di 10 minuti.
Project Image (at will).name: Project Image (at will)

Freedom of Movement (Constant).name: Libertà di Movimento (Costante)
Freedom of Movement (Constant).description: Respingi gli effetti che ostacolerebbero una creatura o ne rallenterebbero i movimenti. Il bersaglio, mentre è sotto l'effetto di questo incantesimo, ignora tutti gli effetti che potrebbero fornire penalità di circostanza alla Velocità. Quando il bersaglio tenta di @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Sfuggire} da un effetto che lo ha @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Afferrato} o @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Trattenuto}, il tentativo ha successo automaticamente, a meno che l'effetto sia un effetto magico e di un livello superiore a quello dell'incantesimo libertà di movimento.

Chilling Darkness (At Will).description:
You shoot an utterly cold ray of darkness tinged with unholy energy. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. You deal 5d6 cold damage, plus 5d6 evil damage if the target is a celestial.

If the ray passes through an area of magical light or targets a creature affected by magical light, chilling darkness attempts to counteract the light. If you need to determine whether the ray passes through an area of light, draw a line between yourself and the spell's target.

Critical Success The target takes double damage.

Success The target takes full damage.

Heightened (+1) The cold damage increases by 2d6, and the evil damage against celestials increases by 2d6.
Chilling Darkness (At Will).name: Chilling Darkness (At Will)

Darkness (At Will).name: Oscurità (A Volontà)
Darkness (At Will).description:
Crei uno strato di oscurità che impedisce alla luce di penetrare o di emanare all'interno dell'area. La luce non entra nell'area e qualsiasi fonte di luce non magica, come una torcia o una lanterna, non emana luce mentre si trova all'interno dell'area, neppure se il raggio di luce emanato si estendesse al di fuori di oscurità. Questo incantesimo sopprime anche la luce magica dello stesso livello dell'incantesimo o inferiore della tua oscurità. La luce non può passare attraverso, perciò le creature all'interno dell'area non possono vedere al di fuori. Da fuori, appare come un globo di oscurità pura.

Intensificato (4°) Anche le creature con scurovisione (ma non scurovisione superiore) possono vedere a malapena attraverso l'oscurità. Esse trattano i bersagli che vedono nell'oscurità come @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{occultati}.

Mask of Terror (Self Only).description:
Il bersaglio appare come una creatura orribile e spaventosa. L’effetto è unico per ciascun osservatore, perciò un umano che osserva il bersaglio potrebbe vedere un demone con le zanne insanguinate, mentre un demone che lo osserva potrebbe vedere un viso angelico splendente.

 

Quando una qualsiasi creatura effettua un’azione ostile contro il bersaglio, la creatura deve effettuare un tiro salvezza su Volontà. Dopodiché è temporaneamente immune fino alla fine del suo turno successivo.

Successo La creatura non è influenzata.

Fallimento La creatura è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Spaventata} 2 prima di aver effettuato la sua azione.

Fallimento Critico La creatura è @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Spaventata} 2 e la sua azione fallisce ed è sprecata.

Intensificato (8°) Puoi prendere come bersaglio fino a 5 creature. Se una creatura effettua un’azione ostile che ha effetto su più bersagli simultaneamente, necessita di un solo tiro salvezza contro maschera di terrore.
Mask of Terror (Self Only).name: Mask of Terror (Self Only)

Plane Shift (To Material or Shadow).description:
Tu e i tuoi alleati attraversate le barriere tra i piani dell'esistenza. I bersagli si trasportano in un altro piano, come il Piano del Fuoco, il Piano delle Ombre o l'Abisso. Devi avere una conoscenza approfondita del piano di destinazione e devi usare un diapason magico creato con materiali provenienti da quel piano come focus per l'incantesimo. Mentre i diapason per la maggior parte dei piani più conosciuti sono non comuni, proprio come l'incantesimo spostamento planare, i diapason per i piani e semipiani più oscuri sono rari.

L'incantesimo è molto impreciso, e appari a 1d20x45 km di distanza dall'ultimo posto in cui si trovava uno dei bersagli (a tua scelta) l'ultima volta che è stato in quel piano. Se per tutti i bersagli si tratta del primo viaggio in quel particolare piano, appari in un posto a caso nel nuovo piano. Spostamento planare non fornisce un mezzo di trasporto per un viaggio di ritorno, anche se un nuovo lancio di spostamento planare ti consente di tornare nel tuo piano precedente a meno che ci siano circostanze impedenti.
Plane Shift (To Material or Shadow).name: Plane Shift (To Material or Shadow)

Invisibility (At Will; Self).description:
Nascosto da un'illusione, il bersaglio diventa @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{invisibile}. Questo lo rende @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{non individuato} a tutte le creature, anche se queste possono tentare di trovare il bersaglio, rendendolo invece @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{nascosto} da esse. Se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile, l'incantesimo termina dopo che quell'azione ostile viene completata.

Intensificato (4°) L'incantesimo dura 1 minuto, ma non termina se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile.
Invisibility (At Will; Self).name: Invisibility (At Will; Self)

Twisting Reach.name: Twisting Reach
Twisting Reach.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The fanged mouths at the ends of a myrucarx's tendrils twist around obstacles. The myrucarx makes two jaws Strikes against the same target, ignoring the target's cover. Both attacks count toward the myrucarx's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks are made. The myrucarx can't Grab as its next action after Twisting Reach.

Painful Light.name: Painful Light
Painful Light.description: When attempting a save against a light effect, a myrucarx gets a result one degree of success lower than it rolled. A myrucarx caught in sunlight is stunned 2 and clumsy 2.

Illusory Persona.name: Illusory Persona
Illusory Persona.description: The illusion created by the myrucarx's project image can resemble any Medium humanoid, including any specific individual it has seen, and has appropriate voice, scent, and mannerisms, allowing the myrucarx to use its Deception check to Impersonate that humanoid if it chooses.

Eclipse Burst.description:
A globe of freezing darkness explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 cold damage to creatures and objects in the area, plus 8d4 additional negative damage to living creatures. Creatures and objects in the area must attempt a Reflex save. If the globe overlaps with an area of magical light or affects a creature affected by magical light, eclipse burst attempts to counteract the light effect.

Critical Success The creature or object is unaffected.

Success The creature or object takes half damage.

Failure The creature or object takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature or object takes double damage. If it's a creature, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} by the darkness for an unlimited duration.

Heightened (+1) The cold damage increases by 1d10 and the negative damage against the living increases by 1d4.
Eclipse Burst.name: Esplosione Oscurante

Odorless.name: Odorless
Odorless.description: A myrucarx emits no smell and can't be detected by scent.

Capsize.name: Capsize
Capsize.description: The bregdi tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. It must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 35 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the bregdi) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

Tug.description:
The bregdi pulls a creature it can reach or a creature holding something it can reach (such as a fishing line in the water).

The bregdi attempts an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, it pulls the creature into an adjacent space. On a critical success, the bregdi can also make a jaws Strike against the creature pulled into an adjacent space.
Tug.name: Tug

Partial Amphibian.name: Partial Amphibian
Partial Amphibian.description: The bregdi can breathe air for up to 10 minutes, or up to an hour so long as its skin remains wet.

Mr. Snips.description: I golem di ferro, tradizionalmente costruiti a forma di gigantesche armature complete o di potenti animali, sono frutto di grande arte e perizia tecnica. Le loro giunture articolate e i corpi corazzati devono essere progettati e fabbricati con grande attenzione e precisione matematica. Questi costrutti vanno inoltre puliti e oliati regolarmente affinché non arrugginiscano con il passare degli anni. Sottoposti a un’adeguata manutenzione, i golem di ferro possono restare efficienti per migliaia di anni ed essere tramandati di generazione in generazione, almeno finché non vengono distrutti dall’intervento di qualche avventuriero. Oltre alla loro incredibile forza, i golem di ferro dispongono anche di un potente soffio tossico, spesso più che sufficiente a eliminare intere squadre di avversari.

Breath Weapon.name: Soffio
Breath Weapon.description: The iron golem exhales poisonous gas in a 10-foot radius centered on the corner of one of the iron golem's squares. The gas persists for 1 round. Any creature in the area (or that later enters the area) is exposed to the iron golem's poison. The golem can't use its Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Vulnerable to Rust.name: Vulnerable to Rust
Vulnerable to Rust.description: Magical rusting effects, like a rust monster's antennae, affect the iron golem normally.

Dismember.name: Dismember
Dismember.description:
Whenever Mr. Snips rolls a critical hit with a scissors Strike, in addition to dealing extra damage, the golem has a chance to dismember its victim. The target must roll a @Check[type:reflex|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Success No additional effect

Failure The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d10.success].

Critical Failure As failure, and one of the targets extremities is severed (the effects of this are up to the GM's discretion).

Golem Antimagic.name: Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
harmed by acid (6d10, 2d8 from areas and persistent damage); healed by fire (area 2d8 HP); slowed by electricity

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. These exceptions are listed in shortened form in the golem's stat block, with the full rules appearing here. If an entry lists multiple types (such as "cold and water"), either type of spell can affect the golem. Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical. Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical. Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be slowed 1 for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6 rounds} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's slowed 1 for that round. Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.

Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison.name: Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison
Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison.description: Casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Neutralize Poison} on the golem deactivates its Breath Weapon for 1 minute.

Inexorable March.name: Inexorable March
Inexorable March.description: The iron golem Strides up to its Speed, pushing back each creature whose space it moves into and damaging them if they try to stop its movement. A creature can attempt to bar the way by succeeding at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37] save. On a critical success, the resisting creature takes no damage; otherwise, it is damaged as if hit by the golem's fist.

Iron Golem Poison.name: Iron Golem Poison
Iron Golem Poison.description:
Any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} value from this poison is reduced by 1 every hour.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 2d6 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 4d6 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 8d6 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 round).

Mr. Snips.name: Mr. Snips

Freedom of Movement (Constant).name: Libertà di Movimento (Costante)
Freedom of Movement (Constant).description: Respingi gli effetti che ostacolerebbero una creatura o ne rallenterebbero i movimenti. Il bersaglio, mentre è sotto l'effetto di questo incantesimo, ignora tutti gli effetti che potrebbero fornire penalità di circostanza alla Velocità. Quando il bersaglio tenta di @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Sfuggire} da un effetto che lo ha @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Afferrato} o @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Trattenuto}, il tentativo ha successo automaticamente, a meno che l'effetto sia un effetto magico e di un livello superiore a quello dell'incantesimo libertà di movimento.

Blade of the Rabbit Prince.name: Blade of the Rabbit Prince
Blade of the Rabbit Prince.description:
This +2 greater striking dancing shortsword has a golden handguard resembling a bird with outstretched wings. The sword's blade is broken halfway up its length, but this doesn't impair the sword's function.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} an opponent using Thievery instead of Athletics, and you add the blade of the Rabbit Prince's item bonus to the check. You do not need to have a hand free if you're wielding the blade of the Rabbit Prince, and your target can be up to two sizes larger than you.

Craft Requirements You must craft the blade in the Harrowed Realm.

Halfling Luck.name: Fortuna Halfling
Halfling Luck.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger The Rabbit Prince fails a skill check or a saving throw

Effect The Rabbit Prince rerolls the triggering check, but he must use the new result, even if it's worse.

Perfect Will.description: If the Rabbit Prince rolls a success on a Will save, he gets a critical success instead, and if he rolls a critical failure, he gets a failure instead.
Perfect Will.name: Perfect Will

Bloody Jab.name: Bloody Jab
Bloody Jab.description: Whenever the Rabbit Prince deals piercing damage, he also deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d10.success].

Phantasmal Calamity.description:
A vision of apocalyptic destruction fills the mind of each creature in the area. The vision deals 11d6 mental damage (basic Will save). On a critical failure, the creature must also succeed at a Reflex save or believe it's trapped (stuck in a fissure, adrift at sea, or some other fate in keeping with its vision). If it fails the second save, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new Will save at the end of each of its turns, and on a success, it disbelieves the illusion and recovers from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} condition.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
Phantasmal Calamity.name: Allucinazione Catastrofica

Baleful Polymorph (At Will).description:
You transform the target creature into a harmless animal appropriate to the area, with effects based on its Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's body gains minor features of the harmless animal. Its insides churn as they partially transform, causing it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. When it recovers from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition, its features revert to normal.

Failure The target transforms for 1 minute but keeps its mind. If it spends all its actions on its turn concentrating on its original form, it can attempt a Will save to end the effect immediately.

Critical Failure The target is transformed into the chosen harmless animal, body and mind, for an unlimited duration.
Baleful Polymorph (At Will).name: Baleful Polymorph (At Will)

Imprisonment.name: Imprigionare
Imprisonment.description:
You perform a ritual to imprison a creature in one of several forms. While some versions of this ritual offer all of the forms, others include only a single form or only a few of them. Whichever form you use, the effect can't be counteracted, though it can be ended by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{Freedom}. Some forms of imprisonment can be ended by other means. Because the ritual requires the target to remain within 10 feet at all times, it typically requires you to subdue the target first.

  • Chains You bind the creature with chains, rendering it unable to use any actions other than to speak. Other creatures that attempt to approach, harm the chains, or free the trapped creature in any way must succeed at a Will save or be unable to do so forever. The chains have Hardness equal to 5 × the imprisonment ritual's spell level, and double that many Hit Points. Destroying the chains frees the target.
  • Object (9th level or higher) You either shrink the creature to an inch in height or transform it into an insubstantial form whose body trails away into wisps below its head. Either way, you trap it inside a gem, jar, bottle, lamp, or similar container. The creature ceases aging and doesn't require food or drink. The creature is still aware of its surroundings and can move within the container and speak, but it can't use any other actions. Destroying the container kills the target rather than freeing it. This form of imprisonment is also transmutation magic.
  • Oubliette (10th level only) You entomb the target in a state of suspended animation deep beneath the surface of the ground and out of tune with reality so that it can't be reached by any means. You also prevent divinations from revealing the location where the imprisonment occurred. Powerful magic such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} can reveal the location of the imprisonment, but even such magic can't free the target from the oubliette; only a 10th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{Freedom} ritual can do so.
  • Prison You render the creature completely unable to leave a particular confined area or structure of your choice, such as a jail cell or sealed cave. The magic also prevents the creature from damaging its prison, either directly or indirectly, to break free. If the creature's prison is entirely destroyed by some external force, the creature is freed, though for some larger or natural prisons, this might be unfeasible.
  • Slumber (sleep effect) You put the creature into an eternal sleep. It ceases aging and doesn't require food or drink. A single sincere physical display of affection from a creature who genuinely loves the target-whether romantically, filially, or otherwise-frees it from the slumber. This form of imprisonment is also enchantment magic.
  • Temporal Stasis You send the creature into a state of suspended animation outside the flow of time. The creature doesn't grow older and can't be affected by any effect from within the normal timestream. While casting this ritual, you can optionally name any amount of time for the stasis; after this duration elapses, the stasis ends. Unlike other forms of imprisonment, temporal stasis can be counteracted by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste} spell. This form of imprisonment is also transmutation magic.

Critical Success You imprison the target. You can either use a form of imprisonment that usually requires 1 additional spell level, or give any creatures trying to use a freedom ritual to rescue the target a -2 circumstance penalty to checks associated with that ritual.

Success You imprison the target.

Failure You fail to imprison the target.

Critical Failure You imprison yourself and the secondary casters in the same way you intended to imprison the target.

Heightened (9th) You can use the object form of imprisonment in addition to the other options, and you can target a creature of up to 18th level. The base cost increases to 2,000 gp.

Heightened (10th) You can use the object and oubliette forms of imprisonment in addition to the other options, and you can target a creature of up to 20th level. The base cost increases to 6,000 gp.

Resist Energy.name: Resistere all'Energia
Resist Energy.description:
A shield of elemental energy protects a creature against one type of energy damage. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. The target and its gear gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose.

Heightened (4th) The resistance increases to 10, and you can target up to two creatures.

Heightened (7th) The resistance increases to 15, and you can target up to five creatures.

Superior Senses.description: The Rabbit Prince automatically critically succeeds at Seek actions to find hidden or undetected creatures within 30 feet and at flat checks to target creatures within 30 feet that are concealed or hidden from him.
Superior Senses.name: Superior Senses

Darting Flurry.name: Darting Flurry
Darting Flurry.description: The Rabbit Prince Strides and makes a blade of the Rabbit Prince Strike and a harrow card Strike at any point during the Stride. His multiple attack penalty increases only after both attacks.

Quick Movements.name: Quick Movements
Quick Movements.description: The Rabbit Prince doesn't trigger reactions with his movement or with any use of the Thievery skill.

Meld into Stone (At Will).description:
Ti fondi con un blocco di pietra adiacente con volume sufficiente a contenere te e i tuoi beni impugnati e indossati. Devi toccare questa pietra quando Lanci l'Incantesimo. Puoi udire, ma non vedere, cosa accade al di fuori della pietra, e puoi lanciare incantesimi mentre sei nella pietra a patto che non richiedano linea di effetto oltre la pietra.

Danni fisici significativi inflitti alla pietra mentre sei al suo interno ti espellono da essa e ti infliggono 10d6 danni. Passapareti ti espelle senza infliggerti danno e pone termine a fondersi nella pietra. Puoi Interrompere questo incantesimo.
Meld into Stone (At Will).name: Meld into Stone (At Will)

Rejuvenation.name: Rinascita
Rejuvenation.description:
When a siege shard is destroyed within 100 feet of a structure, it reforms after [[/br 2d4 #days]] days within the nearest structure, fully healed.

A siege shard within a structure can permanently destroyed by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.QW2gYIKce3W31xXf]{Prove Peace} activity.

Overwhelming Anguish.description:
Frequency once per minute

Effect The siege shard emits a disorienting psychic blast. All creatures within a 15 feet emanation take [[/r 4d6[mental]]] damage (@Check[type:will|dc:20|basic:true] save).
Overwhelming Anguish.name: Overwhelming Anguish

Exorcism.name: Exorcism
Exorcism.description:
Mental damage ignores a siege shard's hardness.

Additionally, proving the siege shard's generative conflict is over with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Ma93dpT4K7JbP9gu]{Prove Peace} activity reverts the creature to ordinary stone.

Surreptitious Siege.name: Surreptitious Siege
Surreptitious Siege.description: While a siege shard is embedded within a structure while using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone}, the structure and all objects within it take twice as long to repair.

Arcane Feedback Trap.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Arcane Feedback Trap.description: A spike of stone bursts from the south wall and quickly retracts.
Arcane Feedback Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:33|name:Quell Rippling Stone] (master) to quell the rippling stone or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th level, counteract DC 31) to dispel the magical feedback.

Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet
Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: A giant bone skipper identifies bones and creatures with a skeletal system in the listed range.

Leaping Charge.name: Carica con Balzo
Leaping Charge.description: The giant bone skipper @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leaps} up to 20 feet. It then makes a mandibles Strike, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.

Marrow Rot.name: Marrow Rot
Marrow Rot.description:
Marrow rot affects only creatures with a skeletal system

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|traits:disease]

Onset 1 day

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Dispel Magic (At Will).name: Dissolvi Magie (A Volontà)
Dispel Magic (At Will).description: Disperdi la magia che si cela dietro un incantesimo o effetto. Effettua una prova di contrasto contro il bersaglio. Se il tentativo ha successo contro un effetto di incantesimo, lo contrasti. Se ha successo contro un oggetto magico, quell'oggetto diventa un oggetto comune del suo tipo per 10 minuti. Le proprietà non magiche dell'oggetto non cambiano. Se il bersaglio è un artefatto o un oggetto simile, fallisci automaticamente.

Detect Alignment (Constant).description:
I tuoi occhi risplendono nel percepire aure allineate. Scegli tra caotico, malvagio, buono o legale. Individui le aure di quell'allineamento. Non ricevi altre informazioni oltre alla presenza o all'assenza. Puoi scegliere di non individuare creature o effetti dei quali sei consapevole che abbiano quell'allineamento.

Soltanto gli incantatori di 6° livello o superiore, eccetto gli incantatori divini, i non morti e gli esseri della Sfera Esterna, hanno un'aura di allineamento.

Intensificato (2°) Individui anche la locazione e la forza di ciascuna aura.
Detect Alignment (Constant).name: Detect Alignment (Constant)

Tongues (Constant).name: Linguaggi (Costante)
Tongues (Constant).description:
Il bersaglio può capire il significato delle parole di tutte le lingue e parlare le lingue di altre creature. In un gruppo misto di creature, ogni volta che il bersaglio parla può scegliere una creatura e parlarci in una lingua che la creatura capisce, anche se non sa di quale lingua si tratti.

Intensificato (7°) La durata è 8 ore.

True Seeing (Constant).name: Visione del Vero (Costante)
True Seeing (Constant).description: Puoi vedere le cose entro 18 metri per quello che sono veramente. Il GM tira in segreto una prova di contrasto contro tutte le illusioni o trasmutazioni all'interno dell'area, ma soltanto allo scopo di determinare se vedi attraverso di esse (per esempio, se la prova ha successo contro un incantesimo metamorfosi, puoi vedere la vera forma della creatura, ma non poni fine all'incantesimo metamorfosi).

Discern Lies (At Will).name: Rivela Bugie (A Volontà)
Discern Lies (At Will).description: Le menzogne risuonano nelle tue orecchie come note stonate. Ottieni bonus di status +4 alle prove di Percezione quando qualcuno Mente.

Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only).name: Invisibilità (A Volontà) (Solo Se Stesso)
Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only).description:
Nascosto da un'illusione, il bersaglio diventa @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{invisibile}. Questo lo rende @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{non individuato} a tutte le creature, anche se queste possono tentare di trovare il bersaglio, rendendolo invece @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{nascosto} da esse. Se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile, l'incantesimo termina dopo che quell'azione ostile viene completata.

Intensificato (4°) L'incantesimo dura 1 minuto, ma non termina se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile.

+3 Major Striking Greatsword (Large).description: Questa enorme spada a due mani è alta quasi quanto chi la impugna. La parte bassa della lama è spesso priva di filo per poter essere afferrata e garantire una maggior maneggevolezza nel combattimento ravvicinato.
+3 Major Striking Greatsword (Large).name: +3 Major Striking Greatsword (Large)

Hateful Gaze.name: Hateful Gaze
Hateful Gaze.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:45] save. If the creature fails, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Avsheros can deactivate or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

No matter the result of the save, a creature can't be affected by Avsheros's hateful gaze again for 1 minute.

Blasphemous Arms.name: Blasphemous Arms
Blasphemous Arms.description: Any weapon gains the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{Unholy} property rune while Avsheros wields it.

Wail of the Betrayed.name: Wail of the Betrayed
Wail of the Betrayed.description:
Avsheros lets out an agonized wail that invokes grief and a feeling of betrayal in those who hear it.

All creatures within 120 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:47] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}. A creature frightened in this way can't willingly accept aid of any kind from an ally until the frightened condition is removed.

On a successful save, the creature is immune to Avsheros's Wail of the Betrayed for 24 hours.

Avsheros the Betrayer.name: Avsheros the Betrayer
Avsheros the Betrayer.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Jealous Musician.description:
Trigger A creature plays an instrument while Casting a Spell or casts a composition spell within 20 feet of the dreadsong dancer

Effect The dreadsong dancer Strides up to 20 feet and makes a songblade Strike against the triggering creature. If the Strike hits, the spell is disrupted.
Jealous Musician.name: Jealous Musician

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Composition S.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Composition Spells

Performance Anxiety.name: Performance Anxiety
Performance Anxiety.description:
A dreadsong dancer is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} if they see or hear a creature critically succeed at a Performance check or at a saving throw against their Dreadsong.

The dreadsong dancer is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} for 1 round if they see or hear a creature critically fail at a Performance check or a saving throw against their Dreadsong.

They can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike.

Dreadsong.name: Dreadsong
Dreadsong.description:
The dreadsong dancer whirls their howling songblades and cloaks themself in illusion magic. Each non-fiend creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] from the dreadsong dancer must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save.

Critical Success No effect, and the creature is temporarily immune for 24 hours. The dreadsong dancer is affected by their performance anxiety.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}, and the dreadsong dancer is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by the creature for 1 minute. The creature can't use Seek to find the dreadsong dancer.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature can't reduce its frightened condition below 2 for 1 minute. In addition, the dreadsong dancer is affected by its performance anxiety.

Dreadsong Dancer.name: Dreadsong Dancer
Dreadsong Dancer.npcAllSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. composition spells

+1 Striking Composite Shortbow.description: Quest’arco corto è fatto di corno, legno e tendini laminati assieme per aumentarne la trazione della corda e la forza del proiettile. Le dimensioni compatte e la potenza lo rendono il preferito degli arcieri in arcione. Ogni volta che una capacità è strettamente riferita agli archi corti, questa si applica anche agli archi corti compositi, a meno che non sia specificato altrimenti.
+1 Striking Composite Shortbow.name: +1 Striking Composite Shortbow

+1 Rapier.description: La spada da lato è una lama perforante lunga e sottile con guardia a cesto. È largamente apprezzata come arma da duello.
+1 Rapier.name: +1 Rapier

Deafening Music Box.name: Deafening Music Box
Deafening Music Box.description:
Symbols of musical notes decorate this gold-framed wooden cube measuring just under 1 foot by 1 foot. A funnel-shaped trumpet protrudes from the box's top at an angle, though it feels surprisingly light. The box has a large button on its side, and it must be set down on a flat surface in order to activate it; while it's activated, the rumbling and churning gears inside the box make it impossible to carry without dropping it.

ActivateAInteract;Effect You press the button on the side of the music box, causing it to erupt with a cacophonous and discordant melody for 1 minute while it plays its entire melody, and it can't be shut off prematurely. The music is so loud that any creature within 60 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for as long as they remain within 60 feet of the music box, and for 1 minute thereafter. On a critical success, a creature need not make any more saves and is temporarily immune to thedeafening music boxfor the next 24 hours; on a success, the creature must attempt a new save each round it remains within 60 feet of the music box.

Giant Centipede Venom.name: Veleno della Scolopendra Gigante
Giant Centipede Venom.description:
Giant centipede venom causes severe muscle stiffness.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw DC 17 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d6[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 1d12[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1 round)

Swift Sneak.name: Furtività Rapida
Swift Sneak.description: Mobana can move her full speed when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneaking}.

Nimble Dodge.name: Schivata Agileo
Nimble Dodge.description:
Trigger Mobana is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see.

Effect Mobana gains a +2 ciurcumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Poison Weapon.name: Avvelenare Arma
Poison Weapon.description:
Requirements Mobana is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand.

Effect Mobana applies a poison to the weapon.

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description:
Mobana deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Supersonic Hearing.name: Supersonic Hearing
Supersonic Hearing.description: Mobana has spent years in close proximity to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.k9BYXA4b7Z4Hy6lZ]{Deafening Music Box} in her possession and is immune to its effects. She also gains a +2 circumstance bonus against sonic effects and effects that impose the deafened condition

Deny Advantage.description: Mobana isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to creatures of 8th level or lower that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, flanking or using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.w6rMqmGzhUahdnA7]{Surprise Attack}.
Deny Advantage.name: Negare Vantaggio

Quick Draw.name: Estrazione Rapida
Quick Draw.description: Mobana Interacts to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon.

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to the assassin.

+1 Striking Heavy Crossbow.description: Questa grossa balestra richiede più forza per ricaricarla ed è molto più ingombrante di una normale balestra, ma è anche molto più potente.
+1 Striking Heavy Crossbow.name: +1 Striking Heavy Crossbow

+2 Greater Striking axiomatic Scourge.description: A scourge-also known as a cat-o'-nine-tails-is a set of several knotted cords made from cotton or leather and attached to a handle. While most scourges are more suitable for torture than combat, the weapons used by the Order of the Scourge have metal barbs woven in to pierce clothing and armor. The scourge is a martial melee weapon.
+2 Greater Striking axiomatic Scourge.name: +2 Greater Striking axiomatic Scourge

+2 Resilient Hellknight Plate.description: Few armors in the Inner Sea region are as memorable as the iconic Hellknight plate. While each order has its own flourishes, Hellknight plate is instantly recognizable to any who know of the Hellknights. Hellknights go to extreme measures to punish non-Hellknights who get their hands on Hellknight plate, and the reward is not usually worth the risk, since for non-Hellknights, the armor is functionally similar to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Gq1cZWSKOtJhKd2p]{Full Plate}.
+2 Resilient Hellknight Plate.name: +2 Resilient Hellknight Plate

Terrible Justice.description:
Trigger A living creature within 30 feet is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect Calennia targets the creature with a death knell spell (DC 34). If the target dies, all of Calennia's enemies within 60 feet are targeted by a fear spell (DC 34). A creature that succeeds at either save is temporarily immune to this ability for 24 hours.
Terrible Justice.name: Terrible Justice

Flog Mercilessly.name: Flog Mercilessly
Flog Mercilessly.description: Calennia Strikes with her scourge. On a hit, she rolls damage three times. This damage is combined (for the purpose of overcoming damage resistance, for example).

Diabolic Certitude.name: Diabolic Certitude
Diabolic Certitude.description: When making a Recall Knowledge check about a devil she's observing, whenever Calennia rolls a critical failure, she gets a failure instead.

+1 Resilient Studded Leather Armor.description: Quest'armatura di cuoio è rinforzata con borchie di metallo e talvolta con piccole placche metalliche, offrendo molta della flessibilità di un'armatura di cuoio con una protezione più solida.
+1 Resilient Studded Leather Armor.name: +1 Resilient Studded Leather Armor

Deep Breath.name: Respiro Profondo
Deep Breath.description: A ravenile can hold their breath for 20 minutes.

Forced Regeneration.name: Rigenerazione Obbligata
Forced Regeneration.description:
Requirements The ravenile's regeneration is currently active

The ravenile regains [[/r 20[healing]]] HP.

Furious Wallop.description:
Requirements The ravenile's regeneration is currently deactivated

Effect The ravenile makes a melee Strike.

This counts as two attacks for the ravenile's multiple attack penalty.

If this Strike hits, the ravenile deals an extra die of weapon damage and the target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
Furious Wallop.name: Furious Wallop

Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.description: Five nozzles hidden across the apartment's ceiling spew thick clouds of acidic poison from a reinforced tank behind the wall.
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:35|name:Block One Nozzle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to block one of the nozzles or @Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:Shut Off the Tank|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to shut off the tank. The trap deactivates after 5 rounds, once the tank is empty.
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.hazardRoutine: (1 action) When it's triggered, the trap has five active nozzles, but at the end of its turn each round, one random nozzle deactivates. On the trap's turn, the active nozzles emit a cloud of acidic poison gas that expands to fill the apartment. The cloud deals [[/r 1d6[acid]]] damage and [[/r 1d6[poison]]] damage per active nozzle to each creature and object in the room (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:33|basic:true|name:Spew Cloud|traits:poison] save). Unattended objects automatically fail saves to avoid the damage.

+1 Striking Elven Curve Blade.description: Praticamente una versione più lunga della scimitarra, questa tradizionale arma elfica ha una lama più sottile di quella comune.
+1 Striking Elven Curve Blade.name: +1 Striking Elven Curve Blade

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description:
A svartalfar killer deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Shadow Step.description:
The svartalfar killer fades into shadow, Strides up to twice its Speed, and reforms.

This movement doesn't trigger reactions, but the svartalfar killer must begin and end in an area of dim light or darkness.
Shadow Step.name: Shadow Step

Spell-Imbued Blade.description:
The svartalfar killer chooses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{Ray of Enfeeblement}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} and makes a melee Strike.

If the svartalfar killer hits, they cast the chosen spell through the weapon at the same target. The spell's attack roll is the same result as the Strike.
Spell-Imbued Blade.name: Spell-Imbued Blade

Smoke Vision.name: Fumovisione
Smoke Vision.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6+4 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Colpo Sbilanciante
Unbalancing Blow.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are flat-footed until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.

Wind-Up.description: For the clockwork assassin to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again.The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:33|name:Wind Down|traits:manipulate,action:disable-a-device] check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.
Wind-Up.name: Wind-Up

Integrated Launcher.name: Integrated Launcher
Integrated Launcher.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

Poison Ink.name: Poison Ink
Poison Ink.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 10 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 3d6[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 4d6[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (1 round).

Rapid Repair.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).
Rapid Repair.name: Rapid Repair

Smoke Bomb Launcher.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.
Smoke Bomb Launcher.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher

Ink Drowning Vats.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Ink Drowning Vats.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:Seal an Ink Spout|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to seal an ink spout, @Check[type:thievery|dc:48|name:Unlock a Door|traits:action:pick-a-lock] (master) to unlock a steel hatch door, or @Check[type:athletics|dc:45|name:Force Open a Door|traits:action:force-open] (master) to Force Open a steel hatch door
Ink Drowning Vats.description: Steel hatch doors automatically lock shut in each of the four vats labeled J2. Four ink spouts (one per vat) jut through a narrow aperture in the ceiling of each vat, 20 feet above.
Ink Drowning Vats.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action for each disabled ink spout. On each of the trap's actions, a spout pours ink, increasing the depth of the ink in that vat by 2 feet. Creatures standing in the ink are exposed to a dose of poison ink. Once the vat is full of ink, the trap stops using actions, but creatures in the vat might start drowning.
Ink Drowning Vats.hazardReset: The trap can be reset by refilling the ink storage tanks above the vats.

Freedom of Movement (Constant).name: Libertà di Movimento (Costante)
Freedom of Movement (Constant).description: Respingi gli effetti che ostacolerebbero una creatura o ne rallenterebbero i movimenti. Il bersaglio, mentre è sotto l'effetto di questo incantesimo, ignora tutti gli effetti che potrebbero fornire penalità di circostanza alla Velocità. Quando il bersaglio tenta di @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Sfuggire} da un effetto che lo ha @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Afferrato} o @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Trattenuto}, il tentativo ha successo automaticamente, a meno che l'effetto sia un effetto magico e di un livello superiore a quello dell'incantesimo libertà di movimento.

Spellbook.name: Incantesimi
