Spellbook.description: Un libro degli incantesimi contiene le conoscenze scritte necessarie per imparare e preparare vari incantesimi, una necessità per i maghi (che di solito ne ottengono uno gratuitamente) e un lusso utile per altri incantatori alla ricerca di nuovi incantesimi da imparare. Ogni libro degli incantesimi può contenere fino a 100 incantesimi. Il prezzo indicato è per un libro degli incantesimi vuoto.

Dimensional Slide.description:
Frequency twice per day

Effect Il'setsya steps through a transient hole in space, instantly teleporting to a space within 60 feet that she can see.
Dimensional Slide.name: Dimensional Slide

Prehensile Tail.description: Il'setsya's prehensile tail can hold and manipulate objects of Light Bulk or less, though it cannot be used to attack. She can spend an Interact action to use her tail to fetch objects stowed on her person, such as potions.
Prehensile Tail.name: Prehensile Tail

Warpwave Spell.name: Warpwave Spell
Warpwave Spell.description:
Il'setsya infuses her next spell with roiling currents of chaos.

If Il'setsya Casts a Spell before her turn is over and the spell affects a creature, that creature is also subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

If she doesn't Cast a Spell before the beginning of her next turn, this action is wasted.

Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet
Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.description:
Il'setya can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants Il'setya the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The Il'setya's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.

Protean Anatomy 10.description:
Il'setya's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after Il'setya takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, she gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time she takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

Il'setya is immune to polymorph effects unless she is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, Il'setya automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.
Protean Anatomy 10.name: Protean Anatomy 10

+1 Striking Shortsword.description: La spada corta presenta in una grande varietà di forme e stili della lama, il cui tratto caratterizzante è però la lunghezza che si attesta sui 60 cm.
+1 Striking Shortsword.name: +1 Striking Shortsword

Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator).name: Strumenti da Scasso (Da Infiltrato)
Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator).description: You need thieves' tools to Pick Locks or Disable Devices (of some types) using the Thievery skill. Infiltrator thieves' tools add a +1 item bonus to checks to Pick Locks and Disable Devices. If your thieves' tools are broken, you can repair them by replacing the lock picks with replacement picks appropriate to your tools; this doesn't require using the Repair action.

Bloodseeker Beak.name: Rostro del Cacciasangue
Bloodseeker Beak.description:
This long, hollow proboscis is harvested from the notorious bloodseeker beast and drips a trickle of blood.

Activate F Envision

Trigger You hit a flat-footed creature with the affixed weapon

When you activate the beak, you deal an extra 1d4 precision damage on your damage roll. If you deal sneak attack damage to the creature, you also deal @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success].

Nimble Dodge.name: Schivata Agileo
Nimble Dodge.description:
Trigger The poisoner is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see

Effect The poisoner gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description: The poisoner deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Colpo Sbilanciante
Unbalancing Blow.description: Creatures the poisoner hits with a critical hit are flat-footed against their attacks until the end of their next turn.

Deny Advantage.name: Negare Vantaggio
Deny Advantage.description: The poisoner isn't flat-footed to creatures of 11th level or lower that are hidden, undetected, flanking, or using surprise attack.

Impromptu Toxin.name: Impromptu Toxin
Impromptu Toxin.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect The poisoner dribbles a few experimental chemicals over a melee weapon. Until the start of their next turn, Strikes with the weapon deal an additional [[/r 2d8[poison]]] damage, and targets hit by Strikes with the weapon must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|traits:damaging-effect] save or become enfeebled 1 or clumsy 1 (the poisoner's choice) for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Hidden Chute.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Hidden Chute.description: A trapdoor in the floor conceals a stone chute.
Hidden Chute.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Remove Trapdoor|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to remove the trapdoor or lock it in position using a catch hidden inside the room's doorframe

+1 Chain Mail.description: Una cotta di maglia consiste di numerosi pezzi di armatura formati da piccoli anelli di metallo uniti in una maglia protettiva. Essa di solito comprende un giaco di maglia, gambali, un paio di bracciali e una cuffia, che insieme proteggono la maggior parte del corpo.
+1 Chain Mail.name: +1 Chain Mail

Storm Arrow.name: Freccia della Tempesta
Storm Arrow.description:
The head of this arrow is made from gleaming copper. When an activated storm arrow hits a target, it is buffeted by raging winds and struck by a bolt of lightning that deals 3d12 electricity damage and the target must attempt a DC 25 Reflex saving throw. If this arrow is shot from a weapon with a shock property rune, the save DC increases to 27, though the attack doesn't benefit from the shock property rune itself.

Activate A Interact

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and isn't affected by the wind.

Failure The foe takes full damage and is buffeted by winds for 1 round, taking a -2 circumstance penalty to ranged attack rolls and a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its fly Speed.

Critical Failure As failure, but the foe takes double damage.

Items.name: Oggetti
Items.description: +1 chainmail, club, nightmare cudgel (carried by one guard only), shortbow (with 40 arrows and 2 storm arrows)

No Escape.name: Nessuna Fuga
No Escape.description:
Trigger An enemy within reach of the Black Whale guard attempts to move away

Effect The guard Strides up to their Speed, following the enemy and keeping the enemy in reach throughout its movement until the enemy stops moving or the guard moves their full Speed.

Shatter Defenses.name: Sbaragliare Difese
Shatter Defenses.description:
Requirements A frightened creature is within melee reach of the Black Whale guard

Effect The guard makes a melee Strike against the frightened creature. If they hit and deal damage, the target becomes flat-footed as long as it's frightened. If the target is already flat-footed, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of the guard's next turn.

Nightmare Assault.description:
Frequency Once per day

The prison guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, the target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:36] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and becomes immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is plagued by nightmarish visiona and becomes fatigued.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until no longer fatigued
Nightmare Assault.name: Nightmare Assault

Clobber.name: Clobber
Clobber.description: The guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, if the target is flat-footed, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or be stunned 2.

Hammering Flurry.name: Hammering Flurry
Hammering Flurry.description: The guard makes three club Strikes against a single target, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after all three attacks are completed.

Greater Planar Rift.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Greater Planar Rift.description: A ragged planar rift drags things into its depths and hurls creatures through from its terminal end.
Greater Planar Rift.hazardDisable: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 46) to seal the rift

Compression.name: Compressione
Compression.description: When a shredskin successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeezes}, it moves through the tight space at full speed. Narrow confines are not difficult terrain for a shredskin.

Control Body.name: Control Body
Control Body.description:
Requirements The shredskin is adjacent to a Medium or Small humanoid-shaped corpse

Effect The shredskin wraps itself around the corpse and takes control of the host body. While controlling a host, the shredskin uses the host's Speed but its own attacks, and it loses its Grab and Enshroud abilities.

Attacks that target the shredskin while it controls a body deal half of the damage to the shredskin and half of the damage to the host body. Attacks that target an area deal damage to both the shredskin and host body normally.

The shredskin can release the host body as a free action at the start of its turn. If the host is destroyed, the shredskin automatically releases the body and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round. A Medium corpse typically has 15 hit points, while a Small corpse typically has 10 Hit Points.

Creatures can notice that a corpse is controlled by a shredskin by succeeding a Perception check against the shredskin's Deception DC.

Enshroud.description:
Requirements The shredskin is grabbing a creature

Effect The shredskin attempts to pin the creature and wrap itself around the creature like a shirt. The shredskin rolls an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC.

On a success, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} and the shredskin can take control of the creature as if using Control Body.

At the start of its turn, the shredskin can automatically Constrict the enshrouded creature as a free action.

An enshrouded creature can attempt a DC 16 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} check to break free (DC 18 if the shredskin critically succeeded its Athletics check to Enshroud).
Enshroud.name: Enshroud

+2 Greater Striking Dagger.description: Questa piccola arma a lama viene tenuta con una mano ed è usata per trafiggere una creatura in combattimento ravvicinato. Può anche essere lanciato.
+2 Greater Striking Dagger.name: +2 Greater Striking Dagger

+2 Greater Striking Hand Crossbow.description: Chiamata anche arco dei vicoli da ladri e malviventi, questa piccola balestra scaglia piccoli quadrelli, usati talvolta per avvelenare i bersagli. È abbastanza piccola per essere azionata con una mano, ma ne richiede comunque due per essere ricaricata.
+2 Greater Striking Hand Crossbow.name: +2 Greater Striking Hand Crossbow

+2 Leather Armor.description: Una combinazione di cuoio flessibile cuoio bollito sagomato, un'armatura di questo tipo unisce una protezione leggera con la massima flessibilità.
+2 Leather Armor.name: +2 Leather Armor

Charming Liar.name: Bugiardo Nato
Charming Liar.description:
When Gage gets a critical success using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.VTg4t8kYTvXcHROq]{Lie} action, the target's attitude toward him improves by one step, as though he'd succeeded at using Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}.

This works only once per conversation, and if he critically succeeds against multiple targets using the same result, he chooses one creature's attitude to improve.

To use this ability, Gage must be lying to impart seemingly important information, inflate his status, or ingratiate himself, which trivial or irrelevant lies can't achieve.

Smooth Operator.name: Smooth Operator
Smooth Operator.description:
When Gage meets a group of up to five people, he can immediately attempt a Diplomacy check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.1Sj2Pz3VI2SFWqZw]{Make an Impression}, comparing the result to the Will DC of each target.

He takes a -3 penalty on this check, and it is possible to get different degrees of success for each target. If he fails or critically fails, he can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attacco di Opportunità
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Innesco Una creatura entro la portata del mostro usa un'azione di maneggiare o un'azione di movimento, effettua un attacco a distanza o esce da un quadretto durante un'azione di movimento che sta usando.

Effetto Il mostro tenta un Colpo in mischia contro la creatura innescante. Se l'attacco è un colpo critico e l'innesco era un'azione di maneggiare, il mostro interrompe quell'azione. Questo Colpo non conta al fine di determinare la penalità da attacchi multipli del mostro e la sua penalità da attacchi multipli non si applica a questo Colpo.

Smoke Vision.name: Fumovisione
Smoke Vision.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Colpo Sbilanciante
Unbalancing Blow.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are flat-footed until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.

Wind-Up.description: For the clockwork assassin to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again. The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Wind Down|traits:manipulate,action:disable-a-device] check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.
Wind-Up.name: Wind-Up

Rapid Repair.name: Rapid Repair
Rapid Repair.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).

Smoke Bomb Launcher.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher
Smoke Bomb Launcher.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

Integrated Launcher.name: Integrated Launcher
Integrated Launcher.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

Delay Condition.name: Delay Condition
Delay Condition.description: The binumir's dual spirit takes longer to be affected by detrimental effects. When the binumir is the target of an effect that imparts the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} condition, the condition is automatically suppressed until the end of the binumir's next turn.

Agonizing Wail.description:
The binumir unleashes a distressing cry that fills others with wrenching sadness. Creatures within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Agonizing Wail for 1 minute.

Success The target can't use reactions for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions for 1 minute as it sobs uncontrollably. It can attempt a new Will save to end the effect at the end of each of its turns.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target can't make saves to end the effect.
Agonizing Wail.name: Agonizing Wail

Dual Assault.name: Dual Assault
Dual Assault.description:
The binumir makes four Strikes; no more than two can be against the same target.

These attacks count toward the binumir's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks have been made.

Inky Tendrils.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Inky Tendrils.hazardDisable:
@Check[type:athletics|dc:48|name:Disable Athletics] (legendary) or @Check[type:athletics|dc:45|name:Disable Acrobatics]{Acrobatics} (master) to tie one tentacle into a knot, rendering it useless, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th level; counteract DC 44) to counteract one tentacle.

The death of the Daemonic Rumormonger permanently dispels all the inky tendrils.
Inky Tendrils.description: Six giant tentacles reach up from the ink lake, grabbing any foes in reach and dragging them underwater.
Inky Tendrils.hazardRoutine: (6 actions) The hazard loses 1 action for every tentacle that is disabled or destroyed. The tentacles can combine their actions to use the hazard's Inky Imitator ability. A broken tentacle can still Strike, but it can't Grab. This hazard takes no multiple attack penalty.

+1 Spell Storing Dagger (contains crisis.description: Questa piccola arma a lama viene tenuta con una mano ed è usata per trafiggere una creatura in combattimento ravvicinato. Può anche essere lanciato.
+1 Spell Storing Dagger (contains crisis.name: +1 Spell Storing Dagger (contains crisis of faith)

Religious Symbol (Norgorber).description: Questo pezzo di legno o d'argento è decorato con un'immagine che rappresenta una divinità. Alcuni incantatori divini, ad esempio i chierici, possono usare un simbolo religioso della loro divinità come focus divino per usare certe capacità e lanciare alcuni incantesimi. Un simbolo religioso deve essere tenuto con una mano per essere usato.
Religious Symbol (Norgorber).name: Religious Symbol (Norgorber)

Steady Spellcasting.name: Incantesimi Stabili
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt Flakfatter's spellcasting action, he attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

Spiritual Epidemic.description:
You curse the target, sapping its spirit and leaving a contagious trap in its essence. The target must attempt a Will save. Any creature that casts a divine or occult spell on the target while it's affected is targeted by spiritual epidemic and must also attempt a Will save. The curse continues to spread in this way.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} permanently.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} permanently.
Spiritual Epidemic.name: Epidemia dello Spirito

Regenerate.description:
An infusion of positive energy grants a creature continuous healing. The target temporarily gains regeneration 15, which restores 15 Hit Points to it at the start of each of its turns. While it has regeneration, the target can't die from damage and its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} value can't exceed 3, though if its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} value becomes 4 or higher, it stays @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} until its wounds are treated. If the target takes acid or fire damage, its regeneration deactivates until after the end of its next turn. Each time the creature regains Hit Points from regeneration, it also regrows one damaged or ruined organ (if any). During the spell's duration, the creature can also reattach severed body parts by spending an Interact action to hold the body part to the area it was severed from.

Heightened (9th) The regeneration increases to 20.
Regenerate.name: Rigenerazione

Abyssal Plague.description:
Your touch afflicts the target with Abyssal plague, which siphons fragments of their soul away to empower the Abyss. The effect is based on the target's Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes 2 evil damage per spell level, and takes a -2 status penalty to saves against Abyssal plague for 1 day or until the target contracts it, whichever comes first.

Failure The target is afflicted with Abyssal plague at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with Abyssal plague at stage 2.

Abyssal Plague (disease) Level 9. The target can't recover from the drained condition from Abyssal plague until the disease is cured

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} increases by 2 (1 day).
Abyssal Plague.name: Piaga Abissale

Divine Wrath.description:
You can channel the fury of your deity against foes of opposed alignment. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose. You deal 4d10 damage of the alignment you chose; each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude save. Creatures that match the alignment you chose are unaffected. Those that neither match nor oppose it treat the result of their saving throw as one degree better.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}; while it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.
Divine Wrath.name: Collera Divina

Silence.description:
The target makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing it using hearing or other senses alone. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use actions with the auditory trait. This prevents it from casting spells that include verbal components.

Heightened (4th) The spell effect emanates from the touched creature, silencing all sound in or passing through a 10- foot radius and preventing any auditory and sonic effects in the affected area. While within the radius, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target. Depending upon the position of the effect, a creature might notice the lack of sound reaching it (blocking off the noise coming from a party, for example).
Silence.name: Silenzio

Harm.description:
You channel negative energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 negative damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 Action (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 Actions (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 Actions (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse negative energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
Harm.name: Ferire

Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the magic missile spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.
Shield.name: Scudo

Energy Aegis.name: Egidia di Energia
Energy Aegis.description:
You protect the target with a powerful, long-lasting energy barrier. The target gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage.

Heightened (9th) The resistances increase to 10.

Heroism.name: Eroismo
Heroism.description:
You tap into the target's inner heroism, granting it a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Heightened (6th) The status bonus increases to +2.

Heightened (9th) The status bonus increases to +3.

Spiritual Weapon.name: Arma Spirituale
Spiritual Weapon.description:
A weapon made of pure magical force materializes and attacks foes you designate within range. This weapon has a ghostly appearance and manifests as your deity's favored weapon.

When you cast the spell, the weapon appears next to a foe you choose within range and makes a Strike against it. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can move the weapon to a new target within range (if needed) and Strike with it. The spiritual weapon uses and contributes to your multiple attack penalty.

The weapon's Strikes are melee spell attacks. Regardless of its appearance, the weapon deals force damage equal to 1d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. You can deal damage of the type normally dealt by the weapon instead of force damage (or any of the available damage types for a versatile weapon). No other statistics or traits of the weapon apply, and even a ranged weapon attacks adjacent creatures only. Despite making a spell attack, the spiritual weapon is a weapon for purposes of triggers, resistances, and so forth.

The weapon doesn't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would. The weapon can't make any attack other than its Strike, and feats or spells that affect weapons do not apply to it.

Heightened (+2) The weapon's damage increases by 1d8.

Guidance.name: Guida
Guidance.description: You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Heal.name: Guarire
Heal.description:
You channel positive energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of positive damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 Action (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 Actions (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 Actions (material, somatic, verbal) You disperse positive energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

Call Toxins.name: Call Toxins
Call Toxins.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Flakfatter exudes an aura that makes poisons more potent. His melee Strikes deal an additional @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison2d8.success]. Creatures in the aura attempting a flat check to remove persistent poison damage must roll twice and take the lower result. Flakfatter can suppress or resume this aura as a free action.

Infector.name: Infector
Infector.description: Flakfatter targets a creature within 30 feet that's currently subject to a poison affliction. The poison affliction progresses to the next stage.

Jonis Flakfatter.name: Jonis Flakfatter
Jonis Flakfatter.npcAllSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. disease and poison

Lawkeeper (+1 Striking Pacifying Club).description:
Si tratta di un robusto pezzo di legno sagomato o riciclato per percuotere un nemico. I randelli spaziano da pezzi di arte militare finemente intagliati fino a semplici rami o comuni pezzi di legno.

EFFETTI DI SPECIALIZZAZIONE DEL CRITICO

Alcuni talenti, privilegi di classe, rune di armi e altri effetti possono fornirti benefici aggiuntivi quando effettui un attacco con certe armi e ottieni un colpo critico.

Questo prende il nome di effetto di specializzazione del critico. L’effetto esatto dipende dal gruppo di armi di appartenenza della tua arma, come elencato qui sotto. Puoi sempre decidere di non aggiungere l’effetto di specializzazione del critico della tua arma.

Randello: Scagli il bersaglio lontano da te fino a 3 metri (scegli tu la distanza). Si tratta di un movimento forzato (pag. 475).
Lawkeeper (+1 Striking Pacifying Club).name: Lawkeeper (+1 Striking Pacifying Club)

Furious Pacifier.description: Lavarsus adds double his Strength modifier to any nonlethal melee Strikes he makes with a bludgeoning weapon.
Furious Pacifier.name: Furious Pacifier

Nonlethal Training.description:
Lavarsus has trained to take down suspects without killing them.

He can choose to make nonlethal attacks with any bludgeoning weapon without taking the usual penalty to his attack roll.
Nonlethal Training.name: Nonlethal Training

Gas Trap.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Gas Trap.hazardRoutine:
(1 action) Each round on its initiative count, the trap pumps more toxic gas into the room.

Any breathing creature in the room takes [[/r 4d6[poison]]] damage (a successful @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|traits:poison,damaging-effect] save halves the damage taken). If a creature acts before the trap on the first round, it has the option of holding its breath to postpone taking damage from the trap-holding one's breath after the trap's first action has no effect, since the air in the creature's lungs is already tainted. Locating and blocking one of the hidden gas vents reduces the poison damage by 1d6-if all four are blocked, the trap is disabled, though the door remains locked. Otherwise, the trap functions for 1 minute before all the gas is expended and characters in the room cease taking damage, after which the trap ventilates the room for 1 additional minute.
Gas Trap.description: A spring slams and locks the room's door before four hidden gas vents begin pumping poison gas into the chamber.
Gas Trap.hazardDisable: Four @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Block Gas Vents|traits:action:disable-a-device] checks to block the gas vents, or a @Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Unlock Door|traits:action:pick-a-lock] check to unlock the door and escape
Gas Trap.hazardReset: The trap must be manually rearmed by unblocking the vents or replacing the poison gas tank in area E30.

True Seeing (Constant).name: Visione del Vero (Costante)
True Seeing (Constant).description: Puoi vedere le cose entro 18 metri per quello che sono veramente. Il GM tira in segreto una prova di contrasto contro tutte le illusioni o trasmutazioni all'interno dell'area, ma soltanto allo scopo di determinare se vedi attraverso di esse (per esempio, se la prova ha successo contro un incantesimo metamorfosi, puoi vedere la vera forma della creatura, ma non poni fine all'incantesimo metamorfosi).

Fly (Constant).description:
Il bersaglio può librarsi nell'aria, ottenendo una Velocità di volare pari alla sua Velocità, oppure di 9 metri, quale dei due valori sia più alto.

Intensificato (7°) La durata aumenta fino a 1 ora.
Fly (Constant).name: Volare (Costante)

Steady Spellcasting.name: Incantesimi Stabili
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt the Daemonic Infector's spellcasting action, he attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

Combustible.name: Combustible
Combustible.description: The first time each round that the Daemonic Infector takes fire damage, his fumes combust, dealing [[/r 30[fire]]] damage to all other creatures within the area of his toxic fumes aura.

Toxic Fumes.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A creature that enters or begins its turn within the aura must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:44] save.

On a failed save, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and on a critical failure, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute. In addition, creatures within the aura attempting a flat check to remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} must roll twice and take the lower result.
Toxic Fumes.name: Toxic Fumes

Breathe Death.name: Breathe Death
Breathe Death.description:
The Daemonic Infector exhales a @Template[type:line|distance:30] of concentrated fumes.

Each creature in the area takes [[/r 12d10[poison]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:44|basic:true] save; on a critical failure the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}).

The Infector can't Breathe Death again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Infector.name: Infector
Infector.description: The Daemonic targets a creature within 30 feet that's currently subject to a poison affliction. The poison affliction progresses to the next stage.

Magic Susceptibility.name: Magic Susceptibility
Magic Susceptibility.description:
An almiraj takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against occult spells.

Any beneficial occult spells with a duration of 1 round or longer cast on the almiraj last twice as long.

Magic Horn.description:
Any living creature slain by the almiraj's horn Strike immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} with no saving throw, in addition to dying.

A severed almiraj horn retains a wisp of its former magic; in combat, the horn can be wielded as a +1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.rQWaJhI5Bko5x14Z]{dagger} or, if affixed to a shaft, a +1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{spear}
Magic Horn.name: Magic Horn

Clockwork Poison Bomb.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardRoutine: (1 action) On its turn, the bomb spews forth a smoky gout of airborne @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.WvDbdESFJY6Be2u1]{Blackfinger Blight} poison. The cloud fills a 20-foot radius, or a 10-foot radius if only one tank remains intact. If the bomb is already in the center of a blackfinger blight cloud, the radius of that cloud increases by 20 feet (or 10 feet, if only one tank remains intact) instead.
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardDisable: Three @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Disable a Latch|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable a Device} to disable the latches that lock the nozzle in place, then one @Check[type:thievery|dc:35|name:Turn Off Nozzle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) check to Disable a Device to turn off the nozzle; DCs decrease by 2 if Oggvurm is immobilized, paralyzed, unconscious, or dead
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardReset: The trap issues smoke for 3 minutes before its tanks run dry. The tanks must be replaced before the bomb can be reactivated.
Clockwork Poison Bomb.description: A clockwork bomb releases gouts of poisonous smoke. The smoke issues forth from a single nozzle attached to two tanks of pressurized poison

Armored Coat.description: Una combinazione di cuoio flessibile cuoio bollito sagomato, un'armatura di questo tipo unisce una protezione leggera con la massima flessibilità.
Armored Coat.name: Armored Coat

Corpseward Pendant.name: Corpseward Pendant
Corpseward Pendant.description:
This small pendant is usually shaped like a humanoid skull or small animal skull.

Activate 3 Interact

Frequency three times per day

Effect You become undetectable to undead creatures for 10 minutes. Undead can't see, hear, or smell you, nor detect you with sensory capabilities such as scent or tremorsense. A creature can attempt a single DC 18 Will saving throw to ignore this effect. If an undead has reason to believe that undetected opponents are present, it can still attempt to Seek or Strike you. If you attempt to use a positive spell to damage undead, use Command Undead, touch or damage an undead creature, or attack any creature while warded in this manner, the pendant's effects immediately end. An undead creature who observes you in this manner or one who succeeds at the Will save is immune to the corpseward pendant for 24 hours.

Hunting Spider Venom (in Reaper's Lancet.description:
This venom erodes its target's defenses, aiding the spider in securing prey.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|name:Hunting Spider Venom]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d10[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d12[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 2d6[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and flat-footed (1 round)
Hunting Spider Venom (in Reaper's Lancet.name: Hunting Spider Venom (in Reaper's Lancet)

Sword Cane Duelist.description: Each round, Pratchett can Strike once with each component of a sword cane without incurring the usual multiple attack penalty. Subsequent attacks incur the multiple attack penalty as usual.
Sword Cane Duelist.name: Sword Cane Duelist

Waxworks Onslaught Trap.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action each turn per drained or destroyed tub. On each action, a different tub spews hot wax at a random creature in the room, dealing 3d12 fire damage to the target and all adjacent creatures (@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true]). On a failure or critical failure, the creature is also encased in hot wax. A creature that starts its turn encased in wax takes 8d12 fire damage and is immobilized until it Escapes the hardening wax (DC 35). Each turn it remains encased, the damage dealt by the hot wax decreases by 2d12 but the DC to Escape increases by 2 (minimum 0 damage, maximum DC 43). A creature that can't get free from the wax might suffocate.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.description: Four huge tubs containing congealed wax, enchanted to melt and envelop unwary intruders, each sit atop a cold fire.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:43|name:Drain Wax from a Tub|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to drain the wax from a tub or @Check[type:athletics|dc:45|name:Push Through Wax|traits:action:force-open] (master) to push through the wax blocking a sealed door and escape (other creatures must push their own way through, as the wax reseals)
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardReset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 hour. At that time, the wax in the tubs cools and congeals, and any wax elsewhere in the room magically goes back into the tubs.

Freezing Alarm.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Freezing Alarm.description: Miniature snowflake-shaped glyphs on the ground cause a layer of ice to ripple over the floor of the room and sound a silent alarm.
Freezing Alarm.hazardDisable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:53|name:Disable Arcana] (legendary) to draw a fiery counteracting glyph over each snowflake, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level, counteract DC 48)

Bind Soul (At Will).description:
Estrai l’anima dal bersaglio prima che possa passare nell’aldilà e la imprigioni in uno zaffiro nero.

Mentre l’anima si trova nella gemma, il bersaglio non può tornare in vita in alcun modo, neanche tramite magie potenti come miracolo.

Se la gemma viene distrutta o se legare anima viene contrastato nella gemma, l’anima è libera. La gemma ha CA 16 e Durezza 10. Una gemma non può contenere più di un’anima alla volta, e qualsiasi tentativo di introdurre un’altra anima al suo interno fa sprecare l’incantesimo.
Bind Soul (At Will).name: Bind Soul (At Will)

Dimensional Anchor (At Will).description:
Interferisci nella capacità del bersaglio di teletrasportarsi e viaggiare tra dimensioni. Ancora dimensionale tenta di contrastare qualsiasi effetto di teletrasporto o qualsiasi altro effetto che teletrasporterebbe il bersaglio in un altro piano. La durata si basa sul suo tiro salvezza su Volontà.

Successo Critico Il bersaglio non è influenzato.

Successo L'effetto dura 1 minuto

Fallimento L'effetto dura 10 minuti.

Fallimento Critico L'effetto dura 1 ora.
Dimensional Anchor (At Will).name: Dimensional Anchor (At Will)

Plane Shift (At Will) (Self Only).description:
Tu e i tuoi alleati attraversate le barriere tra i piani dell'esistenza. I bersagli si trasportano in un altro piano, come il Piano del Fuoco, il Piano delle Ombre o l'Abisso. Devi avere una conoscenza approfondita del piano di destinazione e devi usare un diapason magico creato con materiali provenienti da quel piano come focus per l'incantesimo. Mentre i diapason per la maggior parte dei piani più conosciuti sono non comuni, proprio come l'incantesimo spostamento planare, i diapason per i piani e semipiani più oscuri sono rari.

L'incantesimo è molto impreciso, e appari a 1d20x45 km di distanza dall'ultimo posto in cui si trovava uno dei bersagli (a tua scelta) l'ultima volta che è stato in quel piano. Se per tutti i bersagli si tratta del primo viaggio in quel particolare piano, appari in un posto a caso nel nuovo piano. Spostamento planare non fornisce un mezzo di trasporto per un viaggio di ritorno, anche se un nuovo lancio di spostamento planare ti consente di tornare nel tuo piano precedente a meno che ci siano circostanze impedenti.
Plane Shift (At Will) (Self Only).name: Plane Shift (At Will) (Self Only)

Detect Alignment (Constant) (Good Only).description:
I tuoi occhi risplendono nel percepire aure allineate. Scegli tra caotico, malvagio, buono o legale. Individui le aure di quell'allineamento. Non ricevi altre informazioni oltre alla presenza o all'assenza. Puoi scegliere di non individuare creature o effetti dei quali sei consapevole che abbiano quell'allineamento.

Soltanto gli incantatori di 6° livello o superiore, eccetto gli incantatori divini, i non morti e gli esseri della Sfera Esterna, hanno un'aura di allineamento.

Intensificato (2°) Individui anche la locazione e la forza di ciascuna aura.
Detect Alignment (Constant) (Good Only).name: Detect Alignment (Constant) (Good Only)

Tongues (Constant).name: Linguaggi (Costante)
Tongues (Constant).description:
Il bersaglio può capire il significato delle parole di tutte le lingue e parlare le lingue di altre creature. In un gruppo misto di creature, ogni volta che il bersaglio parla può scegliere una creatura e parlarci in una lingua che la creatura capisce, anche se non sa di quale lingua si tratti.

Intensificato (7°) La durata è 8 ore.

True Seeing (Constant).name: Visione del Vero (Costante)
True Seeing (Constant).description: Puoi vedere le cose entro 18 metri per quello che sono veramente. Il GM tira in segreto una prova di contrasto contro tutte le illusioni o trasmutazioni all'interno dell'area, ma soltanto allo scopo di determinare se vedi attraverso di esse (per esempio, se la prova ha successo contro un incantesimo metamorfosi, puoi vedere la vera forma della creatura, ma non poni fine all'incantesimo metamorfosi).

Dimension Door (At Will).name: Porta Dimensionale (A Volontà)
Dimension Door (At Will).description:
Aprendo una porta che oltrepassa lo spazio normale, ti teletrasporti istantaneamente insieme a qualsiasi oggetto che indossi e trasporti dalla tua posizione attuale in uno spazio vuoto che puoi vedere entro il raggio d'azione. Se con questo incantesimo porti con te un'altra creatura (anche se la stai trasportando in un contenitore extradimensionale), l'incantesimo è perduto.

Intensificato (5°) Il raggio d'azione aumenta fino a 1,8 km. Non è necessario che tu sia in grado di vedere la tua destinazione, a patto che tu sia già stato in quel luogo in passato e che tu ne conosca relativamente la locazione e la distanza dalla tua posizione. Sei temporaneamente immune per 1 ora.

Plunder Life.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a healing effect restores Hit Points to a non-fiend creature in the aura, the amount of Hit Points restored is halved. The rhevanna gains temporary Hit Points equal to the amount of Hit Points restored.

The rhevanna loses any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.
Plunder Life.name: Plunder Life

Detaining Strike.name: Detaining Strike
Detaining Strike.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger The rhevanna hits a creature with a weapon Strike

Effect The rhevanna casts an innate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Dimensional Anchor} spell on the creature.

Lifedrinker.name: Bere Vita
Lifedrinker.description:
Trigger The rhevanna kills a living creature of at least 16th level

Effect The rhevanna drinks the triggering creature's life force and regains [[/r 40[healing]]]{40 Hit Points}. If the triggering creature is a celestial, the rhevanna instead regains [[/r 80[healing]]]{80 Hit Points}.

Malefic Binding.name: Malefic Binding
Malefic Binding.description:
The rhevanna can target celestials with their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} ability, and a gem containing a celestial bound by a rhevanna has Hardness 40.

If the rhevanna destroys a gem in which they placed a celestial, the celestial is destroyed forever.

Rhevanna.name: Rhevanna
Rhevanna.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.description: Subtle but deadly magical runes link this mural to Kharnas's master. Good- or neutral-aligned creatures who examine the mural witness the castle's drawbridge silently descend, revealing an endless darkness.
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:44|name:Disable Thievery] (legendary) to obscure or mar the magical runes set into the mural, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 42) to counteract the mural

Canopy Drop.name: Agenti della Vegliarupe
Canopy Drop.description: A trapdoor, connected to floor sensors, opens in the section of floor marked on the map, while the surrounding floor suddenly tilts to a 45-degree angle and the fountains in the wall begin spraying at high pressure, making the tile slippery and pushing creatures toward the open chute.
Canopy Drop.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:23|name:Jam Trapdoor Mechanism|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to jam the mechanisms and keep the trapdoor from opening, or to locate the bypass switch hidden under a stair riser just outside the room

True Seeing (Constant).name: Visione del Vero (Costante)
True Seeing (Constant).description: Puoi vedere le cose entro 18 metri per quello che sono veramente. Il GM tira in segreto una prova di contrasto contro tutte le illusioni o trasmutazioni all'interno dell'area, ma soltanto allo scopo di determinare se vedi attraverso di esse (per esempio, se la prova ha successo contro un incantesimo metamorfosi, puoi vedere la vera forma della creatura, ma non poni fine all'incantesimo metamorfosi).

Dimension Door (At Will).name: Porta Dimensionale (A Volontà)
Dimension Door (At Will).description:
Aprendo una porta che oltrepassa lo spazio normale, ti teletrasporti istantaneamente insieme a qualsiasi oggetto che indossi e trasporti dalla tua posizione attuale in uno spazio vuoto che puoi vedere entro il raggio d'azione. Se con questo incantesimo porti con te un'altra creatura (anche se la stai trasportando in un contenitore extradimensionale), l'incantesimo è perduto.

Intensificato (5°) Il raggio d'azione aumenta fino a 1,8 km. Non è necessario che tu sia in grado di vedere la tua destinazione, a patto che tu sia già stato in quel luogo in passato e che tu ne conosca relativamente la locazione e la distanza dalla tua posizione. Sei temporaneamente immune per 1 ora.

+3 Wounding Greater Striking Cleaver (La.description: This single‑bladed bearded axe has a jagged blade that's perfect for separating bone from tendon and cartilage.
+3 Wounding Greater Striking Cleaver (La.name: +3 Wounding Greater Striking Cleaver (Large)

Spell Choke.description:
Trigger A creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} within 30 feet of the Daemonic Skinner Casts a Spell with a verbal component or speaks

Effect The Skinner wills the triggering creature's blood to gush from their mouth and constrict their throat. The target's spell is disrupted.

The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.
Spell Choke.name: Spell Choke

Transfusion Aura.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Any time a creature in the aura takes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, the Daemonic Skinner regains the same number of Hit Points as the damage dealt.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.
Transfusion Aura.name: Transfusion Aura

Bloody Sneak Attack.description:
Any creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the Daemonic Skinner's attacks. When attacking a flat-footed creature, the Skinner deals an additional [[/r {2d6}[precision]]]{2d6 precision damage}.

When the monster Strikes a creature that has the flat-footed} condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon.
Bloody Sneak Attack.name: Bloody Sneak Attack

Hook and Flay.name: Hook and Flay
Hook and Flay.description:
Requirements The Daemonic Skinner has a creature grabbed with her blood chain or a creature is affected by her bloody chain aura

Effect The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver Strike against the creature.

Bloody Chain Aura.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Chains of blood bind a bleeding creature to the Daemonic Skinner.

Creatures in range that are taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} can't move out of the aura.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.
Bloody Chain Aura.name: Bloody Chain Aura

Distracting Shadows.name: Ombre Distraenti
Distracting Shadows.description: Skebs can use creatures that are at least one size larger than themself as cover for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} actions.

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description:
Skebs deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Spell Circle.description: By performing an hour-long ritual, an elemental vessel can form a spell circle with an arcane or primal spellcaster. After the spell circle is formed, other spellcasters can join the spell circle by performing the same hour-long ritual while assisted by at least one spellcaster already in the spell circle. Each member of the spell circle must contribute at least one spell to the elemental vessel. The spellcaster permanently loses access to a spell slot equal to the spell's level and the elemental vessel adds the contributed spell to its list of arcane innate spells (regardless of the spell's original type). An elemental vessel can be imbued with no more than three spells per spell level. If the elemental vessel is destroyed, all members of the spell circle regain the spell slots they contributed to the creature. The arcane innate spells shown below represent a typical spell list for an elemental vessel, but each elemental vessel is likely to have different spells depending on what its spell circle has contributed.
Spell Circle.name: Spell Circle

Dispel Vulnerability.description: Whenever a creature successfully counteracts one of its spells, the vessel permanently loses access to that spell and takes damage equal to 4 × the spell's level. The spell circle member who contributed that spell regains access to their contributed spell slot.
Dispel Vulnerability.name: Dispel Vulnerability

Inhabit Vessel.description: Any member of the elemental vessel's spell circle can spend 3 actions to mentally inhabit the vessel for 1 round. While they inhabit the vessel, the inhabiter controls the vessel's actions, and the vessel uses the inhabiter's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers for all checks. Only one creature can inhabit an elemental vessel at a time.
Inhabit Vessel.name: Inhabit Vessel

Internal Spell Strike.name: Internal Spell Strike
Internal Spell Strike.description: The elemental vessel targets an engulfed creature with one of its spells. The spell must have a range of touch.

Water Elemental Vessel.name: Water Elemental Vessel
Water Elemental Vessel.description: Spellcasters create elemental vessels by harvesting raw elemental energy and then binding it within a specially enchanted magic circle to grant it life.

Attack of Opportunity.name: Attacco di Opportunità
Attack of Opportunity.description:
The lusca gains 2 extra reactions at the start of each of its turns that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity with its jaws. It can't use more than one Attack of Opportunity triggered by the same action.

Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Blood Scent.name: Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: The lusca can smell blood in the water up to 1 mile away.

Storm Bringer.name: Storm Bringer
Storm Bringer.description: When the lusca is near the surface for more than 1 hour, clouds appear and deliver a thunderstorm with a 2-mile radius centered on its location. The weather returns to normal 1 hour after the lusca departs.

Capsize.name: Capsize
Capsize.description: The lusca tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. It must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 35 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the lusca) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

Lusca Venom.name: Lusca Venom
Lusca Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 4d6 poison damage and clumsy 1 (1 round)

Stage 2 6d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round)

Ravenous Jaws.name: Ravenous Jaws
Ravenous Jaws.description: The lusca makes three jaws Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the lusca's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the lusca makes all of these attacks. If the lusca subsequently uses the Grab action, it Grabs any number of creatures it hit with Ravenous Jaws.

Lusca.name: Lusca
Lusca.description: A lusca is a predatory sea monster that resembles a three-headed shark with the body of an octopus. Ferocious electrical storms usually herald a lusca's arrival; such violent bursts of electricity result from the creature's superconductive flesh, which allows the lusca to store energy from lightning strikes that it can then discharge at foes.
Lusca.npcSenses: fiutare il sangue, fiuto (impreciso) 30 metri, scurovisione

Flurry of Blows.name: Raffica di Colpi
Flurry of Blows.description:
Shristi makes two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses. He applies his multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally.

As it has the flourish trait, Shristi can use Flurry of Blows only once per turn.

Sky and Heaven Stance.name: Sky and Heaven Stance
Sky and Heaven Stance.description:
Shristi enters a combat stance perfected by past champions of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven. While in this stance, the only Strikes Shristi can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits.

While in Sky and Heaven Stance, Shristi gains resistance 2 to electricity and sonic damage.

Victor's Medallion from the Challenge of.name: Victor's Medallion from the Challenge of Sky and Heaven

Heaven's Thunder.name: Heaven's Thunder
Heaven's Thunder.description:
Frequency twice per day

Effect With a loud shout, Shristi unleashes his ki as a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs his body. Until the end of his next turn, Shristi's unarmed Strikes and Strikes with weapons that have the monk trait deal an additional 3 electricity damage and 3 sonic damage.

Pelmo.description:
I guerrieri che costituiscono la prima linea delle tribù goblin preferiscono combattere in gruppi numerosi, specialmente se sono almeno il triplo degli avversari.

Questi piccoli umanoidi hanno la pelle verde o grigia e una grossa testa dalle lunghe orecchie. Alcuni goblin sono civilizzati e hanno lavorato sodo per diventare membri rispettati nelle comunità umanoidi di appartenenza, ma per buona parte rimangono creature istintive e violente che godono solo nel seminare il caos. Questi goblin pensano solamente a uccidere il bestiame, a rapire neonati o ad appiccare il fuoco agli edifici solo per il gusto di farlo. Adorano giocare scherzi crudeli agli umanoidi più alti, che loro chiamano "gambelunghe".

I goblin sono creature superstiziose, terrorizzate dalla magia e affascinate dal fuoco; i goblin in grado di padroneggiare la magia o il fuoco godono di grande rispetto presso i loro simili. La mentalità dei goblin risulta alquanto incomprensibile per la maggior parte degli altri umanoidi: odiano i canidi, ma dividono le loro tane con i cosiddetti "cani goblin"; attaccano creature più grosse di loro senza battere ciglio, ma sono terrorizzati dai cavalli; inoltre odiano i vegetali ma considerano i sottaceti una prelibatezza. Per un goblin, ovviamente, queste sono tutte opinioni perfettamente coerenti.

Alchemist's Fire (Lesser).name: Fuoco dell’Alchimista (Inferiore)
Alchemist's Fire (Lesser).description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 1d8 fire damage, [[/r 1[persistent,fire]]] damage, and 1 fire splash damage.

Goblin Scuttle.name: Scatto Goblin
Goblin Scuttle.description:
Trigger A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to Pelmo.

Effect Pelmo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Steps}.

Pelmo.name: Pelmo

Cheek Pouches.description: A ratfolk has stretchy cheek pouches that can store up to 1 cubic foot of objects. The ratfolk can remove or store an item using the Interact action. As long as the ratfolk has at least one object in its cheek pouches, its speech is noticeably difficult to understand.
Cheek Pouches.name: Cheek Pouches

Katar Specialist.name: Katar Specialist
Katar Specialist.description: Gref has trained extensively with the katar blade. Any katar he wields gains the finesse trait.

Quick Stow.name: Quick Stow
Quick Stow.description:
Frequency once per round.

Effect Gref stores one held item of light or negligible Bulk in his cheek pouches.

Swarming.name: Swarming
Swarming.description:
A ratfolk can end its movement in the same square as an ally that also has this ability.

Only two such creatures can share the same space.

Wall Run.name: Correre sui Muri
Wall Run.description: The Iroran skeleton can Stride along vertical surfaces, such as walls, as long as it begins and ends its movement on a horizontal surface.

Water Step.name: Camminare sull'Acqua
Water Step.description: The Iroran skeleton can Stride across liquid surfaces. If it ends its movement on a liquid surface, it falls in as normal.

Collapse.description:
Trigger The Iroran skeleton is critically hit

Effect The Iroran skeleton collapses into a pile of bones and the attack deals damage for a hit, rather than a critical hit.

The skeleton can reform in a standing position as an action, but until it does, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}.
Collapse.name: Collapse

Flurry of Claws.name: Flurry of Claws
Flurry of Claws.description:
The Iroran skeleton makes two claw Strikes. If both hit the same creature, the damage is combined for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

The multiple attack penalty applies to the Strikes as normal.

Whirlwind Kick.name: Whirlwind Kick
Whirlwind Kick.description: The Iroran skeleton makes a single Strike and compares the result to the AC of all creatures within its reach, dealing damage to each creature hit.

Tongues (constant).description:
Il bersaglio può capire il significato delle parole di tutte le lingue e parlare le lingue di altre creature. In un gruppo misto di creature, ogni volta che il bersaglio parla può scegliere una creatura e parlarci in una lingua che la creatura capisce, anche se non sa di quale lingua si tratti.

Intensificato (7°) La durata è 8 ore.
Tongues (constant).name: Tongues (constant)

Fast Swallow.name: Inghiottire Rapido
Fast Swallow.description:
Trigger The minchgorm Grabs a creature in its jaws

Effect The minchgorm uses Swallow Whole.

Hydraulic Torrent.description:
A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering those that are its path and possibly pushing them away from you. The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save. Creatures that fail the save are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
Hydraulic Torrent.name: Torrente Impetuoso

Control Water.name: Controllare Acqua
Control Water.description: By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Water creatures in the area are subjected to the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}.

Riptide.description: Tentacles of water rise up and attempt to Grapple all enemies within 15 feet of the minchgorm. The minchgorm attempts an Athletics check against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. On a success, the creature is grabbed (Escape DC 40). On a critical success, or a success against a creature that is already grabbed, the target begins to drown.
Riptide.name: Riptide

Watery Simulacra.description: The minchgorm raises up to eight figures from nearby water, each appearing in an empty space within 60 feet of the minchgorm. A simulacrum can take any shape of size Medium or smaller that the minchgorm desires, including that of a specific individual or object, but is always plainly made of water. The minchgorm can speak, cast spells, and use its senses through its simulacra, spending actions for a simulacrum on a one-for-one basis. By using a single action with the concentrate trait, the minchgorm can cause any number of simulacra to Fly, Step, Stride, or Swim up to 60 feet. A simulacrum uses the minchgorm's AC and saving throws and has 30 Hit Points. A minchgorm can have up to eight simulacra in existence at once. Simulacra dissolve immediately when more than 60 feet from the minchgorm, or if the minchgorm dies or falls unconscious. The minchgorm can dismiss any number of its simulacra as a free action.
Watery Simulacra.name: Watery Simulacra

+2 Striking Crossbow.description: Quest’arma a distanza ha una struttura simile a un arco montata su un’impugnatura chiamata teniere. Il teniere ha un meccanismo per bloccare la corda dell’arco in posizione, collegato a un sistema a grilletto che rilascia la tensione e consente di scagliare il proiettile.
+2 Striking Crossbow.name: +2 Striking Crossbow

+2 Striking Dagger.description: Questa piccola arma a lama viene tenuta con una mano ed è usata per trafiggere una creatura in combattimento ravvicinato. Può anche essere lanciato.
+2 Striking Dagger.name: +2 Striking Dagger

+2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor.description: Quest'armatura di cuoio è rinforzata con borchie di metallo e talvolta con piccole placche metalliche, offrendo molta della flessibilità di un'armatura di cuoio con una protezione più solida.
+2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor

Sidestep.name: Passo Laterale
Sidestep.description:
Trigger The attack roll for a Strike targeting the assassin fails or critically fails

Effect The assassin deftly steps out of the way of the attack. If there's another creature adjacent to the assassin and within reach of the triggering attack, the assassin redirects the attack to that adjacent creature. The attacker then rerolls the Strike's attack roll against the new target.

Sneak Attack.name: Attacco Furtivo
Sneak Attack.description: The master assassin deals an additional [[/r 3d6]] precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

Vorpal Garrote.name: Vorpal Garrote
Vorpal Garrote.description:
Requirements The master assassin used Study Target during the previous round and must have a garrote bolt

Effect The master assassin makes a crossbow Strike against the target she previously studied. If she rolls a success on her attack roll, she gets a critical success instead. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Success No additional effect.

Failure The target takes an additional [[/r {3d12}[precision]]]{3d12 precision damage}.

Critical Failure The target is decapitated and instantly dies unless it doesn't require a head to live.

Running Reload.name: Ricarica in Corsa
Running Reload.description: The master assassin Strides, Steps, or Sneaks, then Interacts to reload her crossbow.

Study Target.name: Study Target
Study Target.description: The master assassin observes a single target she can see, allowing her to use her Vorpal Garrote during the next round.

Point Blank.description: The master assassin makes a crossbow Strike against an adjacent enemy; unlike most ranged Strikes, this Strike doesn't provoke reactions. If successful, the attack deals an additional [[/r 4d8]] precision damage.
Point Blank.name: Point Blank

+1 Studded Leather Armor.name: armatura di cuoio borchiato +1
+1 Studded Leather Armor.description: Quest'armatura di cuoio è rinforzata con borchie di metallo e talvolta con piccole placche metalliche, offrendo molta della flessibilità di un'armatura di cuoio con una protezione più solida.

Expanded Splash.name: Spargimento Ampliato
Expanded Splash.description: Japu's bombs that have the splash trait deal 5 splash damage and splash to 10 feet.

Quick Alchemy.name: Alchimia Rapida
Quick Alchemy.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect Japu creates a single alchemical item from his formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the end of his next turn.

Quick Bomber.name: Lanciatore Rapido
Quick Bomber.description: Japu Interacts to draw a bomb then Strikes with it.

Alchemist Goggles.description:
These brass goggles are engraved with flame patterns and have thick, heavy lenses.

While worn, they give you a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to Craft alchemical items and a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with alchemical bombs.

You can also ignore lesser cover when making Strikes with alchemical bombs.
Alchemist Goggles.name: Occhiali dell'Alchimista

Alchemist's Tools.name: Strumenti da Alchimista
Alchemist's Tools.description: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

Infused Items.description: Japu carries the following infused items, which last 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: infused moderate acid flasks (2), infused moderate alchemist's fires (2), moderate elixirs of life (2), infused reagents (6), infused moderate tanglefoot bags (2).
Infused Items.name: Infused Items

Alchemical Formulas (10th).description: moderate acid flask, moderate alchemist's fire, greater antidote, moderate bravo's brew, moderate elixir of life, moderate tanglefoot bag, wyvern poison
Alchemical Formulas (10th).name: Alchemical Formulas (10th)

Formula Book.name: Formulario
Formula Book.description:
A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

Contains formulas for the following:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{Acid Flask (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]{Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XWkeL34yJK6t5qUE]{Antidote (Greater)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.oCuwJ9IUDAuzsUwa]{Bravo's Brew (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.c21stU5rhN4F2fZl]{Elixir of Life (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.WL4O32qFifxnMj0H]{Wyvern Poison}

Tongues (Constant).name: Linguaggi (Costante)
Tongues (Constant).description:
Il bersaglio può capire il significato delle parole di tutte le lingue e parlare le lingue di altre creature. In un gruppo misto di creature, ogni volta che il bersaglio parla può scegliere una creatura e parlarci in una lingua che la creatura capisce, anche se non sa di quale lingua si tratti.

Intensificato (7°) La durata è 8 ore.

Discern Lies (At Will).name: Rivela Bugie (A Volontà)
Discern Lies (At Will).description: Le menzogne risuonano nelle tue orecchie come note stonate. Ottieni bonus di status +4 alle prove di Percezione quando qualcuno Mente.

Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only).name: Invisibilità (A Volontà) (Solo Se Stesso)
Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only).description:
Nascosto da un'illusione, il bersaglio diventa @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{invisibile}. Questo lo rende @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{non individuato} a tutte le creature, anche se queste possono tentare di trovare il bersaglio, rendendolo invece @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{nascosto} da esse. Se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile, l'incantesimo termina dopo che quell'azione ostile viene completata.

Intensificato (4°) L'incantesimo dura 1 minuto, ma non termina se il bersaglio usa un'azione ostile.

Stunning Strike.name: Colpo Stordente
Stunning Strike.description:
Requirements Ulressia hit a foe earlier this turn with a weapon Strike

Effect Ulressia makes a weapon Strike against the foe. On a success, the foe must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}. On a critical failure, the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} instead.

Crystallize Blood.description:
Ulressia channels her warped powers over crystals through her blade and into a creature's body, partially crystallizing its blood.

Ulressia makes a melee dagger Strike. On a hit, the creature takes damage as normal and must also roll a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.
Crystallize Blood.name: Crystallize Blood

Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet
Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: Ulressia automatically detects crystals or crystalline items within 30 feet.

Aura of Angry Crystals.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Any creature that ends its turn in the aura while in possession of any crystals, gemstones, or other precious stones must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to the aura for 1 hour.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature's crystals reverberate with Ulressia's vengeful aura, sharpening at every corner and digging, as if powerfully magnetized, into the creature's flesh.

The creature takes [[/r 4d6[piercing]]] damage, plus [[/r 5[negative]]] damage for every 2,000 gp the crystals are cumulatively worth (maximum 40 damage).

The creature can't discard the crystals until they leave the aura or roll a successful save against it.

Critical Failure As failure, but [[/r 8d6[piercing]]] damage, plus [[/r 10[negative]]] damage for every 2,000 gp of the crystals' value (maximum 80 damage).

Ulressia can deactivate or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.
Aura of Angry Crystals.name: Aura of Angry Crystals

Ulressia The Blessed.name: Ulressia The Blessed
Ulressia The Blessed.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Tongues (Constant).name: Linguaggi (Costante)
Tongues (Constant).description:
Il bersaglio può capire il significato delle parole di tutte le lingue e parlare le lingue di altre creature. In un gruppo misto di creature, ogni volta che il bersaglio parla può scegliere una creatura e parlarci in una lingua che la creatura capisce, anche se non sa di quale lingua si tratti.

Intensificato (7°) La durata è 8 ore.

Dimension Door (At Will).name: Porta Dimensionale (A Volontà)
Dimension Door (At Will).description:
Aprendo una porta che oltrepassa lo spazio normale, ti teletrasporti istantaneamente insieme a qualsiasi oggetto che indossi e trasporti dalla tua posizione attuale in uno spazio vuoto che puoi vedere entro il raggio d'azione. Se con questo incantesimo porti con te un'altra creatura (anche se la stai trasportando in un contenitore extradimensionale), l'incantesimo è perduto.

Intensificato (5°) Il raggio d'azione aumenta fino a 1,8 km. Non è necessario che tu sia in grado di vedere la tua destinazione, a patto che tu sia già stato in quel luogo in passato e che tu ne conosca relativamente la locazione e la distanza dalla tua posizione. Sei temporaneamente immune per 1 ora.

Freedom of Movement (Constant).name: Libertà di Movimento (Costante)
Freedom of Movement (Constant).description: Respingi gli effetti che ostacolerebbero una creatura o ne rallenterebbero i movimenti. Il bersaglio, mentre è sotto l'effetto di questo incantesimo, ignora tutti gli effetti che potrebbero fornire penalità di circostanza alla Velocità. Quando il bersaglio tenta di @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Sfuggire} da un effetto che lo ha @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Afferrato} o @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Trattenuto}, il tentativo ha successo automaticamente, a meno che l'effetto sia un effetto magico e di un livello superiore a quello dell'incantesimo libertà di movimento.

Detect Alignment (At Will) (Lawful Only).description:
I tuoi occhi risplendono nel percepire aure allineate. Scegli tra caotico, malvagio, buono o legale. Individui le aure di quell'allineamento. Non ricevi altre informazioni oltre alla presenza o all'assenza. Puoi scegliere di non individuare creature o effetti dei quali sei consapevole che abbiano quell'allineamento.

Soltanto gli incantatori di 6° livello o superiore, eccetto gli incantatori divini, i non morti e gli esseri della Sfera Esterna, hanno un'aura di allineamento.

Intensificato (2°) Individui anche la locazione e la forza di ciascuna aura.
Detect Alignment (At Will) (Lawful Only).name: Individuazione dell'Allineamento (A Volontà) (Solo Legale)

Protean Anatomy.name: Anatomia Protean
Protean Anatomy.description:
